115001.name: Anima Tactics: Dinah
115001.description:
The Fallen Angel Dinah, one of the Supreme leaders of Samael, is a legend among legends. Bestowed with godly powers and carrying within her soul the combined power of light and darkness, she is a positive power who seeks a better future for Gaia.

Light Samael Mystic Leader - Lv. 70
At 5 | Dm 5 | Df 10 | Ar 0 | LP: 15 | Re 12 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/5
oo - Blessing (Magic, Effect)
All friendly units within Dinah's Control Zone get +1 Attack and Defense as long as this ability remains in effect. This ability may be channeled through Lucera.
Maintenance: o
oo - Darkness Veil (Magic, Effect)
All enemy units within Dinah's Control Zone suffer Blind Lv1. This ability may be channeled through Umbra. Effect 14.
oo - Energy Projection (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (16 inches). This ability may be channeled through either Lucera or Umbra. If it is, then its Distance is halved.
ooo - Devastation (Magic, Attack)
+4 Attack. Dinah makes a single Attack on all units within 3 inches of either Lucera or Umbra. After resolving it, the spirit that was used to channel Devastation is removed from play.
oooo - Reality Fold (Magic, Effect)
Dinah trades positions on the board with either Lucera or Umbra. Dinah may take up to three friendly units within her Control Zone with her; these Characters are placed in base to base contact with Dinah after the switch in positions. This ability may be used to remove Characters from Hand-to-hand combat.
Limit: Once per game.

DINAH Guardian Angels
Divine Being
While Dinah is in play her controller gets one additional Gnosis point per Turn.
Umbra and Lucera
Dinah has two spirit guardians that will be deployed when she is. They are Umbra and Lucera. These are no more than extensions of Dinah's will with no attributes other than Speed. They cannot be damaged in any way (or removed from the game by other character's abilities) nor can they take any Actions other than to move. Umbra and Lucera are removed from play if Dinah leaves play. If an enemy Character wishes to occupy the same space as either Umbra or Lucera, the spirits are moved up to 1 inch (into an open area) by their controlling player to vacate the space. Umbra and Lucera move freely and independently during Dinah's activation as Intangible units with a Speed of 12 and a Control Zone of 4 inches.
Spiritual Link
Dinah can channel some of her magic abilities through Umbra and Lucera. When she does this Dinah is considered as being in the same position on the board as her spirit guardian. If she tries to channel an ability through a spirit guardian that is not within 16 inches of her (measures are taken after declaring the ability activation), the ability has no effect and that spirit guardian is removed from play.
Angel Guardian
If Dinah would be removed from play for any reason, roll a die, if you roll a 6+ Dinah remain in play with one Life Point. If Dinah is not removed due to this ability then remove one of her spirit guardians from the board. Dinah may only use this ability if there is at least one spirit still in play.

115002.name: Anima Tactics: Genma
115002.description:
Genmar Pheriu Dhanyata is one of the few Devah left in the world, a true rarity even within Samael. Though she has little combat skill, her mastery as a summoner knows no equal. Even the Fallen Angel Jigoku no Kami has acknowledged that, with regard to the invocation of supernatural entities, Genma is his only rival.

Neutral Samael Mystic - Lv. 35+
At 4 | Dm 1 | Df 8 | Ar 0 | LP: 10 | Re 11 | Mo 6/10 | AP 3/4
Summon Level: 3
Affinity: Light, Dark, and Void
Life Link: Genma may redirect damage she suffers for any reason to one of her Summons in play.
ooo - Lasso of Unity (Magic, Effect)
Place a Bind Point on one of Genma's Summons in her Control Zone.
ooo - Vanish (Magic, Effect)
Remove a Bind Point from an enemy Summon in Genma's Control Zone.
ooo - Spiritual Beam (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (12 inches). +3 Damage.

115003.name: Ruiner Pinball
115003.description:
Ruiner Pinball is a 3D pinball video game developed by High Voltage Software and published by Atari for Atari Jaguar in 1995.

Ruiner table setting: Set in 1962, during the Cold War, as nuclear war is imminent. The player has to bring down the DEFCON level from level 5 to 1 and launch the attack on an enemy country while defending his own.
Tower table setting: An adventurer enters a sinister tower to defeat the wicked sorceress and her evil minions. The player has to make her cast three spells to bring down her tower and then escape before it's too late.

Source: Wikipedia, "Ruiner Pinball", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115004.name: Bang It In
115004.description:
A football related target game. The target has 3 holes in it and a goal. The idea is to get the football into one of these scoring areas. You get 5 points if you get it past the goalkeeper, and 10, 15 and 20 respectively for the circular holes.

The mode of getting the ball to the target is to use the footballer provided. His leg is attached to a spring so you can lever it backwards and then let go. If you are lucky, you might score some points. I expect a lot of practice is required.

The target says '50 UP' so I assume the first player to score 50 points, wins.

115005.name: Sword's Edge (Issue 14 - May 2003)
rpgissuearticle: The Gamer's Table - Is there a Danny Ocean in the house?
The Physics of Star Trek  Review
The Writer's Workshop - Point of View - Who Do You Trust?
115005.description:
Volume 2, Number 3
May/June 2003

Cover - Detail of "Battaglia tra tuirchi e cristiani (Ratto di Elena)" circa 1580, by Tintoretto (Jacopo Robusti, 1518-94).

The table of contents is detailed in the Article list below. The page numbers match the PDF release.

115006.name: Cybermorph
115006.description:
Cybermorph is a free-roaming 3D shooter developed for the Atari Jaguar. The cartridge was included as the pack-in game for the system when it launched in 1993. Two versions of the game were released with minor differences. The earlier version (copyright 1993 on the label) is a 2 MB cartridge. The later version (copyright 1994 on the label) is a 1 MB cartridge which excludes introduction and ending animation sequences and has fewer voice samples.

The game is a 3D shooter, with the player piloting a space ship from a third person perspective. There are five levels, each with several planets for the player to explore, with a boss at the end of each level. The player's objective is to recapture lost pods spread out across the different worlds.
The player is accompanied on their adventure by a bald-headed, green female computer guide named Skylar, who, whenever the player hits a mountain, says "Where did YOU learn to fly?".

Source: Wikipedia, "Cybermorph", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115007.name: Ju-on: The Grudge
115007.description:
It is said that when a person dies with a deep and burning grudge, a curse is born. When an average housewife in Nerima, Japan, was murdered in a grisly fashion, it gave rise to a curse so powerful that it threatens to kill at a pace thought unimaginable before. The curse manifests on those who encounter the curse by any means, such as entering the house where the housewife met her violent end or being in contact with somebody who was already cursed. Once Erika Yamada is exposed to the curse while searching for her dog in an abandoned warehouse, the entire Yamada family is put in grave danger as soon as she reunites with them at home. They must now face their individual challenges alone, and only by overcoming the curse together will their family truly be free again.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115008.name: QuizDan
115008.description:
Translation from the back of the box - from Norwegian:

Do you dare to double? Who will be the leader?

Play the success from NRK (Norwegian Public TV) in your livingroom! Just as when Dan Børge Akerø askes questions on NRK, there is more than just knowledge that counts - you also have to control the game. Exploit the team's combined expertise and pick the right leader. Choose whether you want to change question or double the bet. Are you on the best quiz team in the room?

For the friends or the whole family: Two or three teams are asked fascinating questions in general knowledge. They get cryptic hints on what each question is about, and have to choose how hard they want to bet on how well the team knows the theme. Occasionally the questions will - to laughter and surprise - be about something completly different than what the players expect.

Quiz for everybody: The board game is ingeniously created, which makes the expert quizzer and the more normally knowledgeable may compete at the same level; as team mates or as opponents.

115009.name: Ragnarok DS
115009.description:
Throughout the world the people of the major powers live in peace and prosperity, unaware that a great evil lurks on the horizon. There is a clandestine group, who under the guise of scholarly research are plotting to resurrect a goddess whose time has long since passed. To achieve this goal, they need two things: a vessel of flesh and blood to house the spirit of the goddess, and the lives of every living being offered up as a sacrifice. It is against the backdrop of this coming chaos that Ares, an orphan from a small, forgotten village, sets out to seek his fortune as an adventurer. At the start of his journey, he encounters a beautiful young girl with mysterious powers named Sierra, who has not only lost her memories about herself, but also of the world around her. Together, they embark on an adventure that will ultimately decide the fate of the entire world.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115010.name: SpotZim
115010.description:
SpotZim is a brain teaser game that challenges you to find the hidden patterns. As you find patterns that are correct, you'll be cheered on to higher and higher levels. The levels get more difficult by the number of hidden patterns and their complexity. Who will get to Level 50 first? I guess you'll just have to play to find out.

Source: The Game Website.

115011.name: Save My Robots
115011.description:
Save My Robotos is a turn-based programming game similar to The Codex of Alchemical Engineering or Light-Bot 2.0. The goal is to move all 'bots on the screen to the green "X" marks so they can be teleported out. Machines follow the code you've created at the bottom of the screen. All you have to do is program them to make it to their destination. Totally easy to do, right? Right?!

Source: The Game Website.

115012.name: Block Puzzle
115012.description:
User Summary

Use your robot to move the block marked with an X to the right spot. Move other blocks out of the way, but beware: don't block your path! Beat all 20 levels.

115013.name: Pferde, Pferde, Pferde
115013.description:
There are 32 cards with 2 questions and 3 answers for both questions in this game.
Player gets a card if he has answered both questions correctly. Whoever has the most cards at the end of the game wins.

115014.name: Blinky Bill's Ghost Cave
videogamedeveloper: Sunflowers Interactive Entertainment Software GmbH (Sunflowers GmbH)
videogamepublisher: Sunflowers Interactive Entertainment Software GmbH (Sunflowers GmbH)
115014.description:
From the Back of the Box:

Hier ist Blinky Bill !

Der Liebling aller Kinder erobert nun auch die Computerbildschirme. In der Geisterhöhle wartet eine spannende Geschichte, die mit liebevollen Animationen und vielen Ratespielen für beste Unterhaltung sorgt. Der niedliche Koala und seine Freunde fördern Lesen und Gedächtnis auf kurzweilige Weise.

Hier heißt es kreativ sein.

115015.description:
Players have 3-6 cards in hand depending on the number of the players. The first player reads the question and answer choices and his/her left neighbor answers -
if it was correct, then the second question asked, is this also answered correctly, the neighbor gets the card.
If it was incorrect the next player may risk with card answering this question.
If somebody runs out of cards in his/her hand, game ends and the player with the most collected cards wins.
115015.name: Lissy Pferderassen

115016.name: Schlaumeier
115016.description:
Figure 5 cards face up and one for each category is determined. Then a letter uncovered and away you go. Each category must be an appropriate word to be found. Once the first player has to find an appropriate word to all categories he calls wise guy and all others must immediately stop writing.
If you're thinking: Urban-rural River, which is quite correct.5 cards are turned so they are face up and each get a category applied to.
Now one letter is to be uncovered and away you go. For each category the players find an appropriate word that begins with this letter, the words are to be written down. Once the first player finds an appropriate word for all categories he shouts : SCHLAUMEIER and the other Players must immediately stop writing.

Wer findet als Erster die richtigen Wörter?

Text from the Cover

115017.name: One Step Back
115017.description:
User Summary
Get from one door to the next. But beware, the second door will only open up after some time. Meanwhile don't go back because you are being followed. By yourself! Making exactly the moves you made only seconds before. Don't let your past you get you or you'll lose.

The further you advance, the more challenging the levels become.

115019.name: Ford Racing
115019.description:
User Summary

Ford Racing was part of a series of discount genre games released late in the life cycle of the original PlayStation, being marketed to gamers who had not yet upgraded to the PlayStation 2 or another sixth generation console. The title is a standard racing game with career and exhibition modes. In the Career Mode, you build up your reputation by winning races and progress to harder races while being eligible for better Ford cars to race as you advance. As the title implies, the game only features 12 models of cars manufactured by Ford which one might conceivably race.

115020.name: Bomb Chain
115020.description:
Over 40 levels of unique puzzle gameplay. Try to blow up all the bombs on the board by creating the perfect chain reaction. Use the mouse to drag and drop the bombs, you can also drop bombs onto eachother to 'combine' them in bigger type bombs.

The game keeps hiscores and best times, and saves your progress automatically.

Source: The Game Website.

115022.description:
Three promotional cards given out to those who pledged Forceball's Kickstarter campaign.

- Time Out: Take cards from the discard pile and put them back in the draw pile.
- Cool Head: Enables you to draw a Stress card without ending your turn.
- Super Reflexes: Take the speed pile into your hand.

The cards are the mixed up with the regular game cards and add totally new effects to the game.

P.S.: There was a misprint on the cards that make them bigger than the regular game cards, so, they need to be trimmed.
115022.name: Forceball: Kickstarter Promos

115023.name: Master Levels for Doom II
115023.description:
This expansion pack for Doom II contains 20 WAD files (and 1 secret file) created for id Software under contract. In addition, Maximum Doom, a collection of 1830 WAD Files collected from the Internet, was also part of the expansion pack. This expansion was included in the Xbox port of Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil.

Source: Wikipedia, "Doom II: Hell on Earth", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115024.name: Penguins Arena: Sedna's World
115024.description:
It all begins when a penguin legend comes to life in the form of Sedna, the ancient Penguin Goddess. Global warming, pollution... Penguin tribes are endangered. Sedna utters them that there is room for but one tribe. And so the purging begins.

Now it's your turn to join the snowball battles and drive the other tribes into the sea. Penguins Arena is a thrilling and innovative First Penguin Shooter with very short rounds and where the magic of reincarnation, combined with the supernatural ability to return to the game as a ghost, ensures that your character has every chance to change your tribe's fate.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115025.name: Penguinz
115025.description:
User Summary

Kill everything in front of you! You are a penguin with weapons. Buy weapons at the store for the upcoming onslaught. Most levels have a large number of enemies trying to kill you, on occasion you will fight bosses. Includes violent imagery.

115026.name: Pico of the Dark Ages
115026.description:
User Summary

The dark wizard Allucardis has summoned a horde of Uber-Goth marauders, and only you, Pico can save us. Attack enemies to gain combo points which allow stronger attacks, gather health bonuses, kill the enemies, and most importantly don't die! Includes violent imagery.

115027.name: R.I.P. (2007)
115027.description:
Not afraid of Death? What if he is accompanied by Halloween and Rock-N-Roll? Play the part of these antiheroes and go to war in this new action experience! Each character has their own strengths and skills, but this is not a game for the faint of heart. With over 40 levels to RIP through, the results are murderous! You will encounter various enemies who will use their own tactics to try and take you down. Its blood and gore to the extreme. Rest In Peace?

Source: The Publisher Website.

115028.name: RIP 2: Strike Back
115028.description:
Your favorite antiheroes are here to strike back with another score to settle. Death, Halloween and Rock-N-Roll...each character has his own strengths and skills, so pick one and start shooting. In Story Mode, you'll fight through 60 furious levels using an arsenal of upgradeable weapons, tanks, helicopters and turrets or for a quick adrenaline fix, play Rush Mode and see how long you can last. For those who like to shoot, RIP 2: Strike Back salutes you!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115029.name: RIP 3: The Last Hero
115029.description:
RIP 3 - THE LAST HERO combines the dynamics of a hardcore shooter while preserving the elusive classic arcade appeal and never lets up on the intense action. Every level presents a new challenge, requiring you to not only prove your sharp-shooting, but to think and act tactically.

The terrain and environments must be employed to survive waves of adversaries, but since all in-game objects are destructible, you must think fast. Your hero will travel all over the world from the African jungle to the Arctic snow, through secret labs and bunkers, in the streets and skyscrapers of Metropolis city and also go into deep space using a hijacked spaceship.

RIP 3 THE LAST HERO places strong emphasis on character development. Its varied player characters gain experience and evolve into unique reflections of your style through the Skills Tree system. No two players’ experiences will be the same.

A huge arsenal of weapons and special items add to RIP 3 THE LAST HERO's variety and the slick, easy-to-master controls make it effortless to concentrate on bringing the fight to the enemy.

The adrenaline-cocktail of accessible gameplay, dynamite visuals and furious pace raises RIP 3 THE LAST HERO to all new heights.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115030.name: AFL Live
115030.description:
AFL Live is a sports game in the AFL series of Australian rules football video games. It was developed by Big Ant Studios for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Microsoft Windows. It was released on 21 April 2011. Commentary is provided by Dennis Cometti and Brian Taylor.

The gameplay has gone more in depth with the core mechanics. Some specific improvements include, faster ball movement and a more free flowing game, improved control and camera systems, and more scope for tactical adjustments. The possible addition of obscurities such as "behind the play" incidents will potentially add to the longevity of the gameplay experience.

All 17 officially licensed AFL teams from the 2011 AFL season are included in the game. While it also features three extra teams, Victoria, Indigenous All Stars and an All Stars Team (Dream team) from the AFL Hall of Fame Tribute Match.

Source: Wikipedia, "AFL Live", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115031.name: Tank Universal
115031.description:
Tank Universal creates a huge virtual ‘Tron-like’ world where you take part in immense 3D tank battles involving scores of units both friendly and not so friendly in wide open levels!
Players can bombard the enemy from a distance or close the gap and dodge shells point blank - all in an immersive first person perspective.

Features:
- 20 levels of highly addictive and intense tank battles.
- Some missions require you to leave the safety of your tank and explore the world on foot.
- Ability to upgrade weapons and tank equipment.
- Fight alongside allies against highly intelligent and numerous enemies.
- Spectacular looking virtual world and eye-popping particle effects.
- Take the battle in any direction with wide open levels allowing freedom of play.
- Intriguing storyline switching between the 'real world' and the digital virtual world.
- Widescreen resolutions supported.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115032.name: Pushmo
115032.description:
User Summary
Pushmo (alternately titled Pull-blox in the UK and Hisa-Osa in Japan) is a semi-platforming puzzle game

In the game, you control Mallo, who has volunteered to help the builder/caretaker of Pushmo Park to rescue a number of children who've gotten trapped inside the various Pushmo puzzles in the park, thanks to a mischievous boy who keeps resetting the puzzles while they're playing on them.

You do this by pulling out and pushing in blocks so that you can jump and climb up the puzzle to the top where the children are stuck.

115033.name: Zombie Bowl-O-Rama
115033.description:
Bowlers beware - zombies are taking over your favorite bowling alley! Line up your shot, avoid tricky obstacles, and use deadly power-ups to blast these graveyard goons into the gutter!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115034.name: Travel Scavenger Hunt for Kids
115034.description:
From the game's website:

Travel Scavenger Hunt is a great new kids road trip game. To play, each player takes 5 cards and tries to locate various roadside objects. Players may have to find a stop sign, a pickup truck, a license plate with the letter Z, and many others. In addition, several funny "Hear It", "Smell It", and "Feel It" cards encouarge kids to use all their travel senses by listening for sounds, feeling for bumps, and sniffing for scents.

Travel Scavenger Hunt is the ultimate boredom beater and the perfect passenger for your next family roadtrip adventure.

115035.name: PopCap Arcade Vol. 1
115035.description:
User Summary
PopCap Arcade Vol. 1 is compilation of four of PopCap's Xbox 360 Arcade games. The following games are included: Bejeweled 2, Astropop, Feeding Frenzy, and Zuma.

115036.name: PopCap Arcade Vol. 2
115036.description:
User Summary

PopCap Arcade Vol. 2 is compilation of 3 PopCap Xbox 360 Arcade games. The following games are included in the compilation: Feeding Frenzy 2: Shipwreck Showdown, Heavy Weapon, and Peggle Deluxe.

115037.name: Mahjong Cub3d
115037.description:
Mahjong Cub3d features 200 Mahjong-themed puzzles in 3D, along with three different modes and difficulty settings. Also includes the ability to compete head-to-head with a friend.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115038.name: Spirit Magic
115038.description:
From the first page:

Spirit Magic is the practice of animism and ancestor worship. Spirit magicians call upon spirits which manifest their powers on behalf of their summoner or binder. These beings have many
names... dryads, nymphs, diseases, ghosts, nightmares, elementals, ancestors; yet in truth, are all sentient fragments of magical energy from which everything is derived. A spirit does not teach or use magic, rather they are magic.

Spirits flow between the mundane plane and the spirit plane, eternally transferring the power of magic to the mundane world and back again.

Spirit magicians interact with these beings, utilising the spirit’s magic to augment or protect themselves. Such sentient immaterial beings are powerful allies, being capable of independent action and manifesting their powers for unlimited periods of time.

115039.name: Pillage the Village
115039.description:
User Summary

Control a god bent on destroying villages. You can pick objects up and fling them at the ground to do damage. Upgrade your abilities with the money you earn. You can choose to be pacifist (with upgrades such as lethal injections) neutral, or antagonistic. The object is to prevent villagers from leaving the screen.

115040.name: Pizza City
115040.description:
User Summary

You are starting your first day as a pizza delivery man. You must take customers orders to them. Get it there fast for a better tip, but also drive carefully running into objects damages the pizza. Running into pedestrians will cause the police to chase after you. Earn money to upgrade your car, each has different characteristics such as capacity for pizza, miles per gallon, safety, price and speed. Work up your rank to become a valuable employee.

115041.name: Planet Noevo
115041.description:
User Summary

In the year 3024 an asteroid has hit the Earth, killing half its inhabitants, and moving its orbit toward the sun. You went out in search of a suitable planet and were separated. You must survive for ten days on a distant planet while being attacked by aliens.

This is a tactical overhead shooter. You must search for supplies such as foods, metal, electronics and medicine to upgrade your equipment and the base where you are staying.

115042.name: Naruto Shippuden: Dragon Blade Chronicles
115042.description:
As Kuroma Tatsushiro threatens to destroy the world with his mastery over the fearsome Genryu, the Akatsuki plot in the background to use these powers for themselves. Take control of Naruto as he tries to save the world, and guide Sasuke as he searches for his brother, Itachi.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115043.description:
From the back:
FICTION: Two exciting stories with four scenarios. Eascape from the holdfast portrays an early Klingon attempt to steal web technology. The Battle of Olsen's Reach describes the cease fire in which the Federation almost surrendered.

DATABASE: Questions, answers, examples, Why?, Battleforce 2000.

SCENARIOS: Five more exciting new battles for Star Fleet Battles.

TACTICS: Term papers, Ask Uncle Ardak, Victory at Origins.

FEDERATION & EMPIRE: A new scenario, commentaries, notes on the new edition, and optional rules.

SPECIAL FEATURE: playtest counters for space control ships.

NEW SHIPS: Federation War Destroyer and Battle Frigate.
115043.name: Captain's Log #8

115044.name: Pogo Swing!
115044.description:
User Summary

A bunch of kids find an advertisement for a rocket powered swing, that costs $50,000. Of course they need it, but being children they don't have the money. But the idea is settled upon to earn money by jumping off the swingset they do have. Jump off the set earning more money for flips, distance traveled, time elapsed, and bouncing off birds. Use money earned along the way to upgrade your swingest and increase the abilities of the children.

115045.name: 101-in-1 Sports Party Megamix
115045.description:
A collection of one hundred and one family-friendly, addictive sports-themed mini games that anyone can enjoy, solo or together. Tennis Takedown, Brainy Basketball, Execution Dodgeball, Daring Darts, Power Puck, Muddy Tug O' War, Trampoline Tumbling, Submarine Race, and Paintball Battleground are just a few of the fun twists on traditional sports and crazy activities players can look forward to!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115046.description:
From the back:
GHOSTLIGHT: DAY ONE is the story of a Federation F-8 fighter squadron on the first day of the Klingon invasion. Also included: a Ghostlight scenario, a description of the battle in game terms, and the class history of Federation Strike Carriers.

STAR FLEET DATABASE: Communications, announcements, product releases and schedules, Why?, Decisions of the Board of Proposals, Ask Kommodore Ketrick, Conventions and Tournaments, Battle Force 900 (Carrier Groups), and Just Say No!

DOOMSDAY: Even more information on the new Doomsday Edition of Star Fleet Battles. Explosion Strengths. Ten more questions from players. A list of rules changes from the new rulebook and notes on why they were made.

SCENARIOS: The Federation learns fleet tactics in the Battle of Adanerg. The first Kzinti carrier. Fighter pilots attack a convoy to cries of Tang Chi! Hydrans learn there is only one way to skin a cat. Pirates raid a planet defended by fighters. Romulans and Gorns learn the meaning of Cloaked Friendship. Andromedans assault an ISC base.

TACTICS: The largest selection of term papers in the history of Star Fleet Battles, including special sections on fighters and wild weasels. The Tactics Board. Victory at Origins. Ask Uncle Ardak about fighter tactics. Squadron Leader Karsh explains how fleets should engage enemy fighter squadrons.

FEDERATION & EMPIRE: Questions and Answers. A detailed example of carrier operations. The largest selection of Tactical Notes ever! Commentaries. Preview material from Total War. Kzinti CVs in DF&E. Romulan and Kzinti Options. Designer's notes on the new carrier rules. And the Four Powers War.

FOUR NEW CARRIER SSDs: The Romulan SeaHawk-B Light Carrier, Kzinti DDV First Carrier, Lyran Siberian Lion CVA, Gorn Tyrannosaurus-V CVA.
115046.name: Captain's Log #9

115047.name: PointResistance Imminent Position
115047.description:
User Summary

You and your squad must defend your base against enemy units. Select the units class between sniper and assault specialties. Upgrade your units weapons and shields. Your units will gain experience as the game progresses, and can call in tactical support if in a bad situation. You will also be required to clean up the field.

115048.name: 101-in-1 Sports Megamix
115048.description:
101-in-1 Sports Megamix for Nintendo DS offers an assortment of one hundred and one addictive, easy to play yet tough to master sports games that everyone can enjoy! Players will have hours of fun playing volleyball, basketball, bowling, boxing, fishing, and much, much more.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115049.name: Polar Bear Payback
115049.description:
User Summary

Human beings have wrecked havoc on the planets environment, and this polar bear has had enough. Take revenge on the people in your way. Suck their brains out of their skull for bonus, kill them with your paws or their own weapons. Gain power ups such as super speed and invincibility.
Extreme brutality and cartoon violence.

115050.name: Star Fleet Battles: Captain's Module P3 – Scenarios – 1
115050.description:
From the back:
CAPTAIN'S MODULE P3 is a collection of 25 scenarios that will be used in future Star Fleet Battles products, in effect a sneak preview of several products. You have a chance to not only play these scenarios NOW, but to send in your playtest reports and propose additional rules and variants.

24 Star Fleet Battles Scenarios
4 New SSDs: Federation War Destroyer Aegis Escort, Federation Hospital Ship, Klingon D5G Commando War Cruiser, Klingon F5G Commando Frigate.
Also included is a new mini-scenario for Federation & Empire. Special mini-map provided.

115051.description:
From the front cover:
This is the first of a series of informal modules containing various material from future Star Fleet Battles products. The "P" stands for: Preview, Prototype, and Playtest.

Contents include: Chaff, Chain Reactions, Death-Riders, The Frax, Hydran DD Variants, Scenarios, Tournaments, Total War Rules, and F&E Setup Charts.
115051.name: Star Fleet Battles: Captain's Module P1

115052.name: Crimson Gem Saga
115052.description:
In the world of Latein, an artifact formerly known as the Crimson Gem is secretly being sought. Killian von Rohcoff, a recent graduate of Green Hill Chevalier Academy, gets caught up in the action. A sequel to Astonishia Story, the game was retitled due to extensive changes to the game's mechanics.

Source: Wikipedia, "Crimson Gem Saga", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115053.name: Death Jr.
videogamehonor: 2005 Game Critics Best Handheld Game of the Year Nominee
115053.description:
The teenage son of the Grim Reaper, DJ, has been given one final chance to keep out of trouble at school or he'll be shipped off to a military academy. When DJ and his new friends go on a field trip to a museum, DJ opens a locked box to impress Pandora. Predictably, all hell breaks loose and demons run amok. DJ now has to stop them and return the town back to normal before his dad finds out.

Source: Wikipedia, "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_Jr";, available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115054.name: Sega Channel
115054.description:
User Summary

Sega Channel was a hardware add-on for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive released in 1994. Its primary purpose was to provide on-demand play of games through a cable television-based delivery system. The lineup of games would change monthly, and could include full games, demos, special editions or limited releases of games, and contests.

The channel actually functioned as a broadcast channel that constantly transmitted the data for the interactive menu and for all the games that were available for that month. After loading the menu, games could be requested from the system, and the Sega Channel device would read that game's data from the transmission and store in its RAM to be played.

Support for the device was finally shut down on July 31, 1998.

115055.name: FiTS by Reiner Knizia
115055.description:
User Summary

FiTS is an iOS adaptation of the Ravensburger board game of the same name. The basic aim of the game is simple: fill a rectangular game board with different, Tetris-like tiles. If left uncovered, most squares on the board will lose you points at the end of the game. The tiles come out randomly, however, so no game is the same. There are also eight different game boards included that change up gameplay; each one awards different points or penalties for leaving particular squares or combinations of squares uncovered. The game can be played solo or head-to-head with a friend on the same iPad.

115056.name: Legions Realm Monthly (Issue 3 - Nov 2002)
rpgissuearticle: Author T.H. Lain Explores D&D Characters From 3E
Spotlight on Hobby Stores - Dragon's Inc
The Story of Yuriel Blackstone Part II
115056.description:
Volume 1 / Issue 3

The table of contents is detailed in the Article list below.

115057.name: Anima Tactics: Momiji
115057.description:
From the shadows of the eastern lands, the young Kitsune Momiji
has come to serve Samael and the Fallen Angels as one of the top
spies of the organization. Trained as a perfect ninja from the moment she was just a cub, she combines her natural fox magic with the deadliest assassin’s arts.

Dark Samael Prowler - Lv. 45

At 5 | Dm 3 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP: 12 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/4

oo - Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
Momiji becomes Hidden. Upkeep: o

ooo - Tsukinoiri (Subterfuge, Charge)

+ 4 Attack / +2 Damage. This attack cannot be intercepted. This skill can be used only if Momiji is Hidden.

ooo - Kitsune-Bi (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (12 inches). +2 Damage.

o - Kagebunshin (Ki, Effect, Reactive)
If Momiji's Life Points would be reduced to zero, replace her with a Decoy token instead. In the Recovery Phase of the next turn put Momiji back into play within 4 inches of the Decoy token with the same Life Points she had when she used this skill, and then retire the Decoy token. If Momiji is not one the table at the end of the game, she counts as a casualty.
Limit: Once per game.

ooo - Maboroshi Shuriken (Subterfuge, Ranged Attack)
Distance (8 inches). +1 damage. Maboroshi Shuriken cannot be intercepted by the Shield maneuver and the target cannot use a Dodge action. This skill can only be used if Momiji is Hidden

oo - Kage Kitsune (Ki, Effect)
Momiji becomes Intangible until the end of the turn.

115058.name: Banana Nababa
115058.description:
User Summary

In Banana Nababa, you play Harry Flowerpower, a little blocky man who has been sent to Neo Africa to retrieve the mystical hearts being guarded by 6 monsters in a lighthouse. Using a limitless supply of spears and axes, you must defeat each boss to reclaim the hearts and break the wizard's curse!

The game consists entirely of six boss fights, each on a different level of the lighthouse, and no other gameplay. When completed, levels can be replayed to improve on your time

115059.name: Anima Tactics: Morrigan
115059.description:
In more than seven centuries of history, Samael has had among its
members the strangest of entities. With the possible exception of the Fallen Angels themselves, none of these beings can be compared to the creature that is Morrigan, Lady of Space and Time. Her origins are a mystery. She is a legend among legends, a being out of dark tales that roams the earth having taken physical form. The most widely believed tale is that she is one of the nine great Demon Queens, born in ancient times from a distortion in existence that gave her consciousness. However, this may simply be another of the many stories inspired by her thousands of years of existence.

Dark Samael Warrior/Mystic - Lv. 70

At 5 | Dm 6 | Df 9 | Ar 2 | LP: 40 | Re 11 | Mo 6/10 | AP 3/4

Innate Abilities: Damage Resistance, Critical Mastery

oo - Infinium (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (12 inches).

o - Thanatos (Ki, Charge)
Thanatos may only be used against an Enemy Unit that has already been hit by Infinium this Turn. During the movement for this ability Morrigan is Intangible.

oo - Hypnos (Ki, Effect)
An enemy Unit that is within 12 inches of Morrigan is moved, in a straight line, into base to base contact with her. This ability cannot be used on a Unit already engaged in hand-to-hand combat. Effect 16.

oooo - Hades (Ki, Attack)
Morrigan makes three consecutive attacks against the same target. Even if Morrigan takes damage from a Counterattack, the remaining attacks from this ability will still be made.

—-

Morrigan - Lady of Space and Time

Appendices: Any hand to hand attack made by Morrigan ignores 2 points of the defender's Armor.

Phase Step: Morrigan ignores all movement penalties due to difficult terrain, as well as climbing or descending from elevations.

Space Control: An enemy Unit that crosses or is inside of Morrigan's Control Zone reduces the distance that they can Walk, Run, or Charge by 2 inches. Characters of a level equal to or greater than Morrigan's are not affected by this ability.

115060.name: Anima Tactics: Nahimana
115060.description:
Nahimana is the daughter of the Fallen Angel Mo'ôhtavo'nehe, the preeminent Jayán in recent memory. Having inherited many of her father’s qualities, she is an honorable and proud warrior who fights with such ferocity that she has earned the nickname “Princess Blood” among her fellows in Samael.

Neutral Samael Warrior - Lv. 45

At 5 | Dm 6 | Df 9 | Ar 1 | LP 20 | Re 9 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4

Innate Abilities: Critical Mastery.
Arc of Destruction: Nahimana's Attacks affect all enemy Units in base-to-base contact with her.

ooo - Isi-Lu-Ga (Ki, Charge)
This Attack causes Throw.

ooo - U-Yo-Tsv-Hi (Ki, Ranged Attack)
Distance 12 inches. If this Attack hits, Nahimana may make a free Ranged Attack against another enemy Unit within 2 inches of the original target.

o - Spirits' Wrath (Magic, Effect, Reactive)
Remove all negative States from Nahimana, then she suffers Berserk Lv. 3. This ability can be used even if Nahimana is currently suffering from a negative State that wouldn't normally allow her to use abilities, such as Paralyzed or Seal.

115061.name: Anima Tactics: Ophiel
115061.description:
Ophiel Akerontes Zeros, favourite son of the darkness, is the youngest and most ambitious of all the lords of Samael. Despite being the last to join the Circle of Fallen Angels, in only two decades he has become one of the most powerful and active members of the Circle. He is a gloomy figure who enjoys using his shadowy network of agents to advance his agenda of absolute chaos.

Dark Samael Warrior/Mystic Leader - Lv. 70

At 6 | Dm 6 | Df 9 | Ar 3 | LP: 16 | Re 11 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/5

oo - Dark Beam (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (12 inches). If this Ranged Attack causes damage, the target suffers Blind Lv1. Effect 14.

ooo - Devouring Darkness (Magic, Effect)
Target an enemy unit within 16 inches of Ophiel. That character and all units within 3 inches lose 1 Action Point and cannot Walk, Run, or Charge this turn. Effect 14. Difficulty: 3+

ooo - End of Eternity (Ki, Attack)

+ 3 Attack / +3 Damage.

ooooo - Godless World (Ki, Attack)

+ 5 Attack / +5 Damage. Roll two dice and keep the highest result.

115062.name: Anima Tactics: Yuki
115062.description:
Yuki's most striking feature is her icy beauty. One of the last Ice Maidens of Varje, she has been assigned to observe humanity in the name of the fallen angels of Samael. Her powerful elemental powers should help keep her safe during her sojourn.

Neutral Samael Mystic - Lv. 35

At 4 | Dm 2 | Df 8 | Ar 0 | LP: 12 | Re 11 | Mo / | AP 2/4

Spirit of the Snow: Yuki cannot Walk, Run, Charge, or use Free Movement.

ooo - Tree Frost (Magic, Movement)
Place Yuki anywhere within 24 inches of her current position. This movement cannot be intercepted and ignores all movement penalties.

ooo - Absolute Zero (Magic, Effect)
Enemy Units within 12 inches and in Line of Sight of Yuki cannot make any kind of movement or Charge for the rest of the Turn. Effect 18:
Limit: Once per game.

oo - Ice Splinters (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance 16 inches. +1 Attack / +2 Damage.

oo - Blizzard (Magic, Effect)
One enemy Unit within 20 inches and in Line of Sight of Yuki suffers Slow Lv. 1 and has the distance of its Ranged Attacks as well as the Speed of its Movements halved until the end of the Turn. Effect 16.

115063.name: Anima Tactics: Samael Agent
115063.description:
The Circle of Fallen Angels regularly employs resourceful and dangerous individuals to further its goals. Making up a shadowy network of operatives, Samael Agents are empowered to sow chaos and confusion across all of Gaia in their name.

Neutral Samael Mystic/Warrior - Lv. 20+

At 4 | Dm 3 | Df 8 | Ar 0 | LP: 10 | Re 9 | Mo 8/12 | AP 2/4

Agent: Samael Agents are not unique characters and you may include 1 for every 150 Levels in a Samael Party. For example, a party of 300 levels could include up to two Samael Agents.

ooo - Magic Beam (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (16 Inch). +1 Damage

ooo - Arcane (Magic, Effect)
A Character within the Samael Agent's control zone is affected by one of the States chosen, and paid for, from the Agent's skill card. If no state was chosen, and paid for, then this ability can't be used. Effect: 15

Samael Agent Skill Card

A Samael Agent can possess any combination of the following options, as long the added levels do not take their total level above 40. Any option cannot be chosen more than once.

The Agent recovers one more Action point per turn. Lv. +10
The Agent becomes a Level 1 Summoner with affinity to their own faction. Lv. +5
Magic Beam's cost is reduced to oo. Lv. 5
Arcane causes Paralyze Lv. 2. Lv. +10
Arcane causes Blind Lv. 2. Lv. +5
Arcane causes Slow Lv. 2. Lv. +5
Arcane causes Healing Lv. 2. Lv. +5
Arcane causes Haste Lv. 2. Lv. +5
Arcane causes Protection Lv. 2. Lv. +5
Arcane's Effect is increased to 16. Lv. +5
The Agent gets the Innate Ability Flight. Lv. +5
The Agent gets +1 Attack and +1 Damage. Lv. +5
The Agent gets the following ability. Lv. +5
oooo - Valkyrie (Ki, Charge)

+ 2 Attack/+2 Damage

Alignment: If the Agent's Arcane ability causes either Paralyze, Blind, or Slow, then the Agent is changed to being Dark faction rather than Neutral. If the Agent's Arcane ability causes either Healing, Protection, or Haste, then the Agent is changed to being Light faction rather than Neutral. If none are chosen, then you decide whether the Agent is either Dark or Light faction.

115064.name: John Sinclair: Ewige Jugend
115064.description:
Summary from Publisher Blurb:

This is the first adventure module for John Sinclair. The story begins at the point where the adventure in the Core Rules ends. So the GM and the players can just go on.

This book contains 3 complete adventures and some new equipment, monsters and additional rules.

115065.name: Explodemon!
115065.description:
An explosive homage to SNES-era platformers mixed with a modern physics-puzzle twist, Explodemon is non-stop action mayhem like you've never seen before. Players use Explodemon's self-destructive nature to combat enemies and fly through the air, all the while solving a huge variety of physics-based puzzles (and, naturally, causing incalculable collateral damage).

When the peaceful planet of Nibia is attacked by the malicious Vortex forces, the fate of the star system is thrust into the one pair of hands it shouldn't be: the malfunctioning Guardian robot Explodemon.

Source: The Game Website.

115066.name: Cabals: Magic & Battle Cards
115066.description:
Cabals: Magic & Battle Cards is an online trading card game for iPhone, iPad, Android devices, Windows Phone 8, Windows, Mac and browsers. Cabals features six cabals vying for control of an original, fantasy- and alchemy-themed world. Instead of featuring just cards, however, Cabals uses a game board that requires players to mix card powers with spatial considerations. Matches are designed to be short and end either when the enemy stronghold is captured or when one side reaches a certain number of domination points. Cabals is free to play and each account comes with a balanced starter deck of cards, but in-app purchases are available to expand the card pool and abilities available.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115067.name: Transarctica
115067.description:
Back of the box

Transarctica, a giant steam-engine, a monster of wind and fire, belching out huge clouds of smoke and steam across an ice-locked landscape, searching for the Earth's lost Sun.

- Plan and build your own train with more than 40 classes of wagons
- Realistic depictions and handling of a leviathan
- 1000 ton steam engine capable of pulling a hundred carriages
- Tense wargame element. Battles between trains feature sabotage, missiles, cannons, mines, infantry . . .
- Game unfolds in real time: you must constantly plan and update your strategy to outwit the war-trains of the Viking Union
- Trade between towns for mammoths, machinery slaves, etc. and manage natural resources such as coal and lignite
- Frighteningly realistic scenario of a possible future for our plant. 256 colours on PC VGA and 32 colours on ST and Amiga.

115068.name: Die Bahnwelt
115068.description:
The player directly moves one character in three dimensions in an overhead perspective through science fiction themed dungeons. The player can shoot in eight directions. There are also different second characters that the player can indirectly control through AI. There are multiple weapons that can be collected that can be switched at will. There is a lifebar that regenerates if no damage is taken for a period of time. The game has a save system. There is a partial fan translation into English available for this game. The game is currently freeware.

Source: Wikipedia, "Die Bahnwelt", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115069.name: The Koronus Bestiary
115069.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Humanity may have settled untold worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but only the most audacious of Rogue Traders would dare claim that it asserts any true dominion over this lawless region of space. For every conquered planet there are dozens more under the control of vile aliens. Explorers operating in the Expanse are sure to encounter these threats in their journeys, either by accident or design, and must be ready lest their ship and their profits be lost.

The Koronus Bestiary, a supplement for Rogue Trader, is a detailed compendium of deadly beasts, hostile xenos, unholy daemons, and other dangers that fill the uncharted regions of the Koronus Expanse. In addition to its many adventure seeds and plot hooks, this comprehensive tome features art and descriptions for a range of foes, including Shadowkith, Thornmaws, Void Krakens, and a host of others. Looking for even more vile enemies? The Xenos Generator rules allow players to create alien species as varied and dangerous as they can imagine!

115070.description:
The USSR represents a whole epoch of World History. During the ten decades that this country was in existence its enormous territory was for the most part closed to foreign visitors, which excited many myths about the Soviet reality. Locked behind the Iron curtain that blocked off the flow of information, and described by Sir Winston Churchill as "the mystery wrapped inside an enigma" the USSR inspired hatred among many but curiosity among all. The memorabilia and souvenirs from the USSR are some of the most recognized and popular in the world. And with the Russian current government pursuing an ever-uncertain political course of its larger predecessors the Map Ticket-to-Ride - USSR will be of interest for virtual travelers from all over the world.


СССР олицетворяет целую эпоху всемирной истории. На протяжении семи десятилетий существования этого государства его громадная территория была практически закрыта для иностранных посетителей, что провоцировало появление огромного количества мифов об СССР, которые до сих пор не дают угаснуть интересу к его истории. Символика уже давно не существующего государства продолжает занимать туристов со всего мира и активно тиражируется в качестве сувенирной продукции. Карта Ticket to ride СССР будет интересна не только многочисленным жителям бывших советских республик, но и путешественникам со всего света".
115070.name: USSR (fan expansion for Ticket to Ride)

115071.name: Die Stadt, das Blut und der Tod: Frankfurt bei Nacht
115071.description:
From the Back Cover:

Die Stadt...

regiert von einem Prinzen, um den sich heftige Gerüchte ranken. Verwaltet von einem gespaltenen Rat der Erstgeborenen.

...das Blut...

wird knapp in Frankfurt, denn Überbevölkerung bedroht das Unleben aller Kainskinder der Mainmetropole. Jede Nacht wird zur Existenzfrage. Überall herrschen Doppelzüngigkeit und Falschheit.

...und der Tod.

Allgegenwärtig, drohend, letztlich unabwendbar. Er lauert hinter der Fassade glitzernder Bankhochhäuser. Er harrt der Kainiten in den Bürgerhäusern und Slums des Molochs Frankfurt.

Und er weiß: Seine Zeit wird kommen.

Frankfurt bei Nacht enthält:


eine detaillierte Beschreibung der Rhein-Main-Region, ihrer Geschichte und Kultur
mächtige Kainskinder, die hier, am Puls der deutschen Wirtschaft, ihre finsteren Pläne verfolgen, sowie
Evas letzte Tochter, eine komplette, spielbereite Vampire-Geschichte, die mitten hineinführt ins dunkle Herz der Stadt.



User Translation from German:

The City...

is ruled by a prince who wraps himself in violent rumours. Maintained by a divided Council of the firstborn.

...Blood...

is becoming scarce in Frankfurt, because overpopulation threatens the unlife of all Kindred of the metropolis. Each night, the question of existence. Everywhere duplicity and falsehood prevail.

... and Death.

Ubiquitous, menacing, ultimately inevitable. He lurks behind the facade of glittering bank skyscrapers. He waits for the Cainites in the town houses and slums of the Frankfurt Molochs.

And he knows: his time will come.

Frankfurt by Night includes:


A detailed description of the Rhine-Main region, its history and culture
Powerful Kindred who are pursuing here, on the pulse of the German economy, their sinister plans, and
Eve's last daughter, a complete, ready to play vampire story that leads right into the dark heart of the city.

115072.name: Trolle, Träumer, tiefe Wälder
115072.description:
From the Back Cover:

Der Deutschland-Quellenband für Wechselbalg: Der Traum

Schon vom jeher ist Deutschland ein Land der Sagen und Legenden. Sei es das Nibelungenlied, seien es die Märchen der Gebrüder Grimm - Feen haben schon immer eine große Rolle in der Geschichte des Landes gespielt. Die Geschichte des Landes hat sich in all diesen Jahren auch in der Geschichte der Kithain widergespiegelt und zu einer einzigartigen Tradition geführt.

Trolle, Träumer, tiefe Wälder enthält:


Einen Überblick über das geographische Gefüge, die Freistätten und skurillen Bewohnern Deutschlands aus dem Blickwinkel der Träumenden,
Unzählige Anregungen, Abenteuerideen, Hintergrundkonzepte und interessante Charaktere sowie
Die spielbereite Geschichte "Schatten des Verfalls", die die Charaktere an den Hof zu Mannheim führt.



User Translation from German:

The Germany sourcebook for Changeling: The Dreaming

Right from time immemorial, Germany is a land of myths and legends. Be it the Nibelungenlied, be it the fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm - fairies have always been a big part in the history of the country played. The history of the country has been reflected all these years in the history of Kithain and led to a unique tradition.

Trolls, Dreamers, and the Deep Woods contains:


An overview of the geographical structure, the sanctuaries and scurrilous residents of Germany from the perspective of the dreamer,
Countless suggestions, ideas, adventure, interesting characters and background concepts and
The ready-to-play story "Shadow of Decline" that leads the characters to the court of Mannheim.

115073.name: 3-D Monster Chase
videogameversion: Spanish ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
UK ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115073.description:
Original cassette inlay

You are trapped within the three floors of a subterranean maze. Your task is to search for the missing keys whilst avoiding the monsters guarding them. Each time that you find a key and return to your starting point, a bomb is activated, you have a limited time in which to defuse it.

WILL YOU BE THE SUPREME WORLD CHAMPION?

User addition
Maze is in 3D, like a Doom/ Wolfenstein predecessor

115074.name: 3D-OXXO
videogameversion: Dutch ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115074.description:
User Summary

Dutch freeware game by Roelof Koning about the boardgame "Forma o Colore" a.k.a. "OXXO"

115075.name: 400 Metros
videogameversion: Spanish ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release
115075.description:
User Summary

Spanish running game which appeared on the complementary cassette on the Soft Spectrum magazine, issue 09.View is from the side, with one player racing against the clock, from left to right.

115076.name: San Guo Yan Yi Qi
115076.description:
This is a variant of Xiangqi based on the Three Kingdoms era, but is distinct from San Guo Qi.

The board is four sided. Three sides represents the three states of the Three Kingdoms era, i.e. Shu, Wu and Wei, and have the same complement of seeds as in Xiangqi. The fourth side contains only 5 seeds, i.e. Han Emperor, 3 Chariots and 1 Cannon.

The objective of the game is to defeat the other two states.

The Han Emperor cannot move. Players may enter into an alliance with any other player by moving one of his/her Horse onto specific spaces next to the Han Emperor seed. When that happens, the third player takes control of the Han Emperor's 3 Chariots and 1 Cannon seeds. Once allianced, the two players cannot capture each other's seeds.

The Han Emperor may also be disposed, by capturing with a Horse. When that happens, the other two players automatically enter into an alliance, and the third player takes control of the Han Emperor's 3 Chariots and 1 Cannon seeds.

The movements of the pieces remain largely the same as Xiangqi except for the following differences:
1) It is no longer possible to block the Horses or Elephants/Ministers.
2) On the first move of the game for each respective player, players cannot move the Cannon out of their own territory.
3) Witin their own territory, Soldiers can only move forward one step at a time. Upon reaching the border, Soldiers may also move 1 step sideways. Once beyond the border, Soldiers may move 1 step forward/backward/sideways, but cannot retreat behind the border.

When a player is checkmated and General seed is captured, his/her remaining seeds are taken over by the player who captured the General seed.

115077.description:
Spook is a game that can be played with the Shibumi game system. It uses the 4×4 board, 15 red, 14 black, and 1 white ball.


Rules

The board (the haunted castle) starts empty.

A Visit to the Haunted Castle

Two players, Red and Black, take turns placing one ball of their colour either on an empty board hole or on a 2×2 platform. Starting with Red the pyramid is built up until in the last turn Black places the white ball (Spooky the ghost) on top. Black then also makes the first move of the second phase of the game.

The Getaway
(To be played in candlelight.)

On their turn a player must either


remove a ball (of any colour) to drop Spooky or
remove a free ball (of any colour) which is orthogonally adjacent to Spooky and move Spooky there. If possible this move may be repeated arbitrarily removing additional balls of the same colour.


Only if no move is available then


if Spooky is isolated he must be placed orthogonally adjacent to any ball on the board or on a platform,
otherwise one unpinned ball of the opponent must be removed (a ball drop may occur).


As usual, pinned balls (supporting more than one ball) may not be removed.

Aim

The player who has no more balls of their colour on the board wins the game.
115077.name: Spook

115079.name: OutRank
115079.description:
OutRank your opponents and be the first person to exhaust their playing hand. OutRank features the five branches of the Military. Army, Navy, Marines, Air Force and Coast Guard.
In OutRank each player is dealt 7 cards, the remaining cards become the draw pile. The first player challenges the player to their left with 1-5 cards of the same rank from their hand. The player answering the challenge can either surrender or try and OutRank each card with a card from their hand of the same suit and higher rank. The answering player may choose to surrender at any time by picking up all cards in play and adding them to their hand. All other players are in a support phase and have the option of supporting a challenge with cards from their hand which have the same rank as cards already in play. If all the challenging cards are answered and there are no other cards being played then the cards in play are removed from the game. The player who was answering becomes the new attacker and play continues clockwise. A game is over when a player has used all of the cards in their hand.

115080.name: The Book of Props
115080.description:
From the Back Cover:

Where Time Has No Boundries...

Enter the lairs of the Damned. Uncover chambers that have been hidden from mortal view for centuries. Delve into the most foreboding corners of your imagination. Discover tomes, artifacts, and remarkable havens. Or avoid the skulking and immerse yourself in the lights and sounds of your very own nightclub.

Bring Your Stories into Vivid Reality...

You can go to all these places and more, without ever leaving your home. The Book of Props will take you there. The Book of Props is a comprehensive how-to for designing everything from sets to costumes to believable characters. This book combines the best of Live-Action and stage theatre, enabling you to bring the World of Darkness alive as it's never been before.

The Book of Props features:


Professional tips on costumes, props, and makeup;
Set designed, from simple changes anyone can throw together to elaborate constructions detailed with step-by-step precision; and
Techniques and tips actors use to get into and maintain a persona.

115081.name: 4 en Raya
videogameversion: Spanish ZX Spectrum release by Grupo de Trabajo Software S.A.
Spanish ZX Spectrum release by VideoSpectrum
115081.description:
User Summary

Video game version of the Connect Four boardgame.

115082.name: Mind's Eye Theatre Prop Deck
rpg: Laws of the Wild (1st and 2nd Editions)
115082.description:
User Summary:

A deck of 100 cards (two of which are the front and back cover) for use with the various Mind's Eye Theatre live action role-playing games. These represent a variety of props, from physical items such as modern and medieval weapons, to cards denoting the various supernatural traits of game characters (Blood, Rage, Gnosis, Pathos, Glamour, Willpower).

115083.name: X³: Albion Prelude
115083.description:
A Bridge Between the Old and New X Universe
X³: Albion Prelude plays in a time between the old and the new X Universe. It shows a universe in flux, and prepares players for things to come. The old X Universe is passing; a new X Universe is about to be created.

War!
The X universe is undergoing a period of massive change. What started as a conflict of interest between the Earth and the races of the X Universe has now escalated into a full scale war. Play a part in a war scenario bigger than anything the X Universe has ever seen before!

Corporations Compete for Control of the Future
With the war as a backdrop, corporations are vying for power and are driving the X Universe in a new direction. A technological breakthrough will soon allow massive accelerators, forming highways in space and allowing the economy to expand on an unprecedented scale. Highways, a key feature of X Rebirth, are not yet ready, but you can see them being built and participate in the power struggles around the construction of much larger self sustaining economies.

Feature overview

A new plot throws you into the power struggle between corporations at a time of war.
More than 30 new ships and stations
New Stock Exchange feature allows advanced investment strategies
Improved graphics quality setting for high end machines
Improved UI introducing charts to visualize economic developments
Support for head tracking




Source: The Game Website.

115084.name: Portal Defenders
115084.description:
User Summary

Portals have opened up, and bad guys are coming through them in waves. You will have to beat them all up using your spoon and limited supply of bombs. Jump, attack and move around the screen. Includes violent imagery and cannibalism.

115085.name: 737 Cockpit
videogameversion: UK ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release
115085.description:
User Summary

Flight simulator of the Boeing 737, released in 1982 by Machinecraft

115086.name: Small World: Cursed!
115086.description:
From within the app

This is an in app purchase. This expansion adds 2 new races and 5 new powers:

Races

Goblins
Kobolds




Powers

Were
Cursed
Ransacking
Marauding
Hordes Of

115087.name: Fractal: Make Blooms Not War
115087.description:
From the award-winning team that brought you Auditorium and Pulse : Volume One comes Fractal, an enthralling music puzzler experience. Push, Combo, and Chain your way through a pulsing technicolor dreamscape all the while expanding your consciousness at 130 BPM.

3 sexy game modes

CAMPAIGN MODE

Campaign Mode takes you through the world of discovery. Each level offers new possibilities of play, while continually expanding on challenges. This is NOT a "more of the same game" scenario; we spent a lot of time crafting a lush campaign that expands, bends, twists, and creates new elements of gameplay that will completely alter the way you view the game. Throw in checkpoints at every ten levels and you have one beautiful experience.

PUZZLE MODE

Sometimes, it’s just nice to have a controlled environment. Puzzle Mode exposes the underlying mechanics of the game, then pushes them to the limit. Test your mettle against 50+ intense scenarios that will hone your skills enough to see you through Campaign mode, right before they set your brain on fire.

ARCADE MODE

If the other modes strike you as too contemplative, Arcade Mode might be more your speed. It’s a good thing the pushes are unlimited, because time is tight and you’ll need to step lively if you want to see the other side of a minute.

Source: The Developer Website.

115088.name: 747 Flight Simulator
videogameversion: UK ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release
115088.description:
User Summary

Flight simulator of the Boeing 747. Described upon release as the most accurate simulation ever. Featured 7 British airports to take off from and land on. Joystick supported but optional.

115089.name: Small World: Grand Dames
115089.description:
From within the app:

This is an in app purchase. It adds 3 new races and 2 new powers.

Races

White Ladies
Gypsies
Priestesses




Powers

Peace Loving
Historian

115090.name: 75 M.M.
videogameversion: Spanish ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115090.description:
User Summary

Arcade shooter where you operate a bomber flying to the left (sideview). Appeared on the complementary cassette on Libreria de Software Spectrum; issue 10 (Grupo de Trabajo Software S.A.)

115091.name: Poto & Cabenga
115091.description:
User Summary

One day Cabenga is out riding her trusty steed Poto, when a dragon catches her and drags her to a distant land. You must control both Poto and Cabenga simultaneously. Avoid enemies, and capture leaves. Holding space bar causes Poto to dash, releasing it causes Poto to jump, releasing space bar causes Cabenga to dash and pressing space causes Cabenga to jump.

115092.description: Become a hockey team manager. Your goal is to create a strong team roster. To accomplish this, You have been given a specific amount of money. Think carefully about every bid You make. How much really is every player worth? Bid too much and You risk losing everything, bid too little and someone else will get this player. Because there are other managers biding for the best players.
115092.name: Pirmais Piecinieks

115093.name: FlatOut 3: Chaos and Destruction
115093.description:
FlatOut 3: Chaos & Destruction brings a new dimension to high speed destruction racing.

Feel the adrenaline pulse through your veins as you barrel through insane race tracks against monster trucks, race cars, off road vehicles and much more.

FlatOut 3: Chaos & Destruction is demolition racing at its extreme. Real world physics with 9 different game modes, and over 47 different vehicles available. Players may choose to race, smash and destroy their opponents in a wide variety of online and offline options.

Lay waste to farm houses, fences, and then wreak havoc in a Detroit suburb, race up the walls in giant waste disposal sewers. Let the chaos begin as you race through over 60 different tracks, narrowly avoiding wrecking balls, Double Decker buses and much more.

Create as much destruction in the all new monster tuck mode.

Choose from 20 different playable characters, select your weapon from the 47 available vehicles! Create as much Chaos & Destruction! In stuntman mode anarchy rules create havoc with some rag doll fun.

FlatOut 3: Chaos & Destruction offers more vehicles, game modes and different ways to demolish your opponents before crossing the finish line.

Source: The Game Website.

115094.description:
"Lissy horse behavior" in English
Players have 3-6 cards in hand depending on the number of the players. The first player reads the question and answer choices and his/her left neighbor answers -
if it was correct, then the second question asked, is this also answered correctly, the neighbor gets the card.
If it was incorrect the next player may risk with card answering this question.
If somebody runs out of cards in his/her hand, game ends and the player with the most collected cards wins.
115094.name: Lissy Pferdeverhalten

115095.description:
"Lissy Around the horse" in English
Players have 3-6 cards in hand depending on the number of the players. The first player reads the question and answer choices and his/her left neighbor answers -
if it was correct, then the second question asked, is this also answered correctly, the neighbor gets the card.
If it was incorrect the next player may risk with card answering this question.
If somebody runs out of cards in his/her hand, game ends and the player with the most collected cards wins.
115095.name: Lissy Rund ums Pferd

115096.name: Mind's Eye Theatre Gift Deck
rpg: Laws of the Wild (1st and 2nd Editions)
115096.description:
From the Back of the Pack:

The Last Generation of Warriors

The Mind's Eye Theatre Gift Deck consists of sturdy laminated
cards printed in silver and black inks.Each card details the rules for a werewolf Gift in Laws of the Wild. The cards are easy to reference and contain everything you need to use a power while playing and running live-action games.

Game tools for Mind's Eye Theatre


The long-awaited Gift deck for the popular Mind's Eye Theatre and Laws of the Wild Revised
Application to all of White Wolf's live-action games
Tools that all Laws of the Wild players can use

115097.name: Power Fox 4
115097.description:
User Summary

The Gods have rebelled against India for not providing shwarma. You must fight them off as Power Fox. A frantic fighting game, you can drill through rocks for items, attack, and use upgrades for your attack.

boardgamehonor: 2012 Golden Geek Best Board Game Expansion Nominee
115098.description:
Game description from the publisher:

Qua-Boom! After an epic battle between Quaxos and the Three-Eyed Dragon of the Quarmageddon, the Quarmageddon is released upon us! Quarriors! Quarmageddon, the second expansion set to the Quarriors! dice-building game, adds forty new custom dice powering six new Creatures and two new Spells for you to bring a serious smack-down to the battlefield of hexahedron monster combat. Some battle-hardened Creatures come equipped with a new "Immunity" ability so they can laugh off whatever your opponents throw at you! No guts, no Glory!

This expansion set features an updated Quarriors! rulebook and a box that stores the expansion and base set.
115098.name: Quarriors! Quarmageddon
boardgamepodcastepisode: Season 3: Episode #4 A Cheater and a Liar

115099.name: 911 TS
videogameversion: UK ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115099.description:
From the instructions

911TS


A fearsome journey ahead. A grim evening. The world's leading sports car. Hasty collections of equipment. A frantic race against time at every stage. Only the ultimate driving skills and the best use of extra equipment will get you to your destination.

FEATURES



Equipment Choice Selection
Super Smooth Scrolling Scenery
Eight Unique Game Stages
Stage Timer and Bonus
Detailed 'On-Screen' Game Monitor
Equipment Collection Stages




SCENARIO


The course is there, waiting, all set to devour you at the slightest mistake. Eight fierce sections, each with it's own challenges. Skillful driving and thoughtful use of extra equipment is the key to the game. You will choose Dunlop tyres of course, but which ones? SP82 Rally Tyre for dusty conditions? Perhaps Dunlop formula for all round rally performance? The choice is yours and it could cost you your life. At the least it will cost you money. Life would be simple if finances were bottomless but alas no. You only have two thousand pounds to spend on your vehicle. Not only that but you are responsible for collecting the equipment yourself. So as you may gather, the task ahead is to say the least, a bit tough!

User Summary
Racing game where you can outfit your Porsche 911 between the eight stretches of track you're facing. An AI operated car is chasing you and trying to push you off the road - as if racing against the clock and evading all road obstacles wasn't enough!

115100.name: Playbook: The Elder's Revenge
115100.description:
From the Back Cover:

The Prince: America in Three Acts. One of the year's most eagerly anticipated theatrical openings. Then, suddenly, it was canceled without warning. Backers pulled out, actors had "accidents," and playwright Andre LeRoux was told he had one night to leave the city.

But now LeRoux is ready to unveil the secrets hidden in his script on a new stage. From across the country, the vampires gather to judge his work- or for other, more sinister purposes. Is he an artistic genius whose work was misunderstood, or merely a pawn in an Elder's revenge?

The Elder's Revenge is a chronicle for The Masquerade; White Wolf's game of live-action Vampire role-playing. It contains character sheets, prop letters, and everything else needed to run the chronicle centered on the mysterious play The Prince: America in Three Acts. Also included are the complete script and production notes for performing The Prince. The Elder's Revenge allows you to step outside the game and onto the stage while never leaving the World of Darkness.

115101.name: Power Tank
115101.description:
User Summary

Take control of a tank and shoot the discs. The discs change color as you damage them, growing darker until destroyed. Your tank will recoil after a shot. You must avoid the discs. Once a disc is destroyed a star icon will be left behind. Collect enough of these to upgrade your tank in several categories: rate of fire, damage, speed, shield, and decrease recoil. You can also collect extra lives.

115102.name: Practice Chapped
115102.description:
User Summary

The time has come for an all out battle against the bad guys, however green lentil has become a yellow lentil, and deer has lost it's muscles. So you must first practice in the rock forest. You fight the assasins with a giant sword. Attack, jump and navigate the screen.

115103.name: Abu Simbel Profanation
videogameversion: Spanish ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release
UK ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release
115103.description:
User Summary

You're Johnny Jones, and you're trying to find your way in the tomb of Abu Simbel in search for ancient treasures. Collect the diamonds in order to unlock doors and avoid everything else!

115104.name: Hexe Lilli Zauberhafter Abenteuerspaß
115104.description:
Lilly the Witch conjures up animals into the nursery and the player must find the correct counter-spell to let the animals disappear before the parents come home. The animal cards are laid out in a 5 x 5 square and there are witch figure in front of four rows. You take one of the characters, places them in front of the free row/column, revealing the cards and if he/she can disapear any animal he takes card.
If there is a empty row/column in this game, player with the most animals wins

115105.description:
From the Designers:
You are twisted. I can’t believe you actually want to put these adorable kittens in a blender! I guess that’s none of my business. Maybe you’re more of a dog person. Sure, kittens are curious by nature, but when they get in a kitchen full of dangerous appliances, it is up to you to save them.

This fast-paced card game has players working to save all of their own kittens before the unthinkable happens. But sometimes the only way to save your precious litter of kittens is to let those curious little cats learn the lesson of why you should never play in a Blender!

According to the box: A portion of the proceeds will be donated to a no kill cat shelter.

Objective:
Save your kittens and send your opponents' kittens to The Blender.

Setup & Play:
Put the game box top on the table, open-side up and place the oversized Blender card inside, face-up: that's The Blender. Place the oversized Box card face up in the base of the box: that's The Box. Leave a little space between The Blender and The Box: that's The Counter. Assign each player a Kitten color (red, green, blue or yellow), shuffle the deck, deal each player 6 cards and it's time to start saving adventurous kittens.

On each turn, players play two cards and then draw back up to 6. Kitten cards may be played into The Blender, The Counter or The Box. All other cards are played face up in front of the player so that all players can see which cards have been played.

Players can play Kitties on the Move to move kittens to or from The Blender, The Counter or The Box; the number on the card specifies the number of kittens that can each be moved 1 space. Playing a Blend card will destroy the kittens currently in The Blender, save the kittens in The Box, and move the kittens on The Counter into The Blender unless countered by another player's Blend "Pulse" card.

Players can move kittens around with other cards as well. Kittens in the Blender moves all of the kittens on The Counter or in The Box to The Blender. With These Cats in the Blender a player can move all cats of a chosen color from The Counter and The Box to The Blender. Kittens in the Box moves all kittens in The Blender or on The Counter to The Box, while Cats on the Counter moves all the kittens in The Blender or The Box to The Counter.

Total chaos reigns when the Dog's in the Kitchen as each player gives her hand to the player in the direction indicated on the card.

The game ends when all 16 of the Blend cards have been played. Saved kittens are worth 2 points each, blended kitties cost 1 point each. Highest score wins.

Contents: 1 oversized Blender card, 1 oversized Box card, 110 playing cards (64 Kittens: 16 in each of 4 colors - red, green, blue and yellow; 18 Kitties on the Move: 6 of each number; 16 Blends: 8 Regular Blend & 8 Blend Black; 4 Dogs in the Kitchen: 2 left & 2 right; 2 Kittens in the Blender; 2 Your Cats in the Blender; 2 Cats on the Counter; 2 Kittens in the Box), rules.
115105.name: Kittens in a Blender

115106.name: Prehistoric
115106.description:
User Summary

You are a dinosaur, and your species is going extinct. It is up to you to collect all the eggs in order to ensure that your species should survive. Collect eggs, jump on the enemies, slide down hills, jump to great heights and make use of your ground stomp ability .

115107.name: Prehistoric 2
115107.description:
User Summary

The game starts out after Prehistoric. You have grown a tail and beady little eyes. Stomp the ground, jump, grind down hills and collect eggs. However shortly into the game you are transported into the future. Meet robots and other futuristic things.

115108.name: Welt der Tierkinder
115108.description:
World of baby animals
Facts from the animal kingdom: How can an emperor penguin its young among thousands? As newly hatched turtles find their way to the sea? Hedgehogs have spines at birth?

There are 2 questions in each card with 3 answers for each questions. The winner is whoever can answer most questions correctly and thus can collect the most cards.
If the current player answers incorrectly the next player may risk with one of his collected card to answer it.

Contents:

32 large format cards with color photos

115109.name: Presidential Knockout
115109.description:
User Summary

Box as either George W. Bush or John Kerry in this first person winner take all showdown on the White House lawn. Choose between uppercuts, jabs and defensive maneuvers which regain your strength.

115110.name: Strange Cases: Tarot Card Mystery
115110.description:
"FBI Agent Claire Ellery has a knack for getting assigned strange cases. The latest a triple kidnapping in a small, unknown town. But what initially seems like an open and shut case soon unravels into something much more sinister. Follow the tarot cards left by an anonymous source and search mysterious hidden object scenes for clues to help Agent Ellery rescue the kidnapped girls and stop an evil ritual in this chilling puzzle adventure game. "

Source: The Developer Website.

115111.name: Lost in the City
115111.description:
"After the first date with a charming girl named April, our hero wakes up alone in an unknown abandoned city after being drugged. He is trapped and believes this somehow involves April.
