Explore the city while trying to investigate how April is involved. Help the hero survive in an atmosphere of drama and suspense. Are you Lost in the City?"

Source: The Developer Website.

115112.name: Primary
115112.description:
User Summary

Once the world was awash in color, but then the Void arrived, and now color has almost vanished. So the Hueman Roy must climb Prizm tower to stop the Void. Run, jump, wall slide, and change color. Depending on what color you are, different platforms will support you. You will need to change color on the fly. Collect crayons for bonus points.

115113.name: Prison of Industry
115113.description:
User Summary

The government of the United States began implanting microchips in peoples brains in 1959. In 2012 the government activated these chips and took control of all the people, and put them in prison. One person escaped, that is you. Make your way through various levels, make use of your adrenaline to do things like climb the walls. Do tricks to regain adrenaline and make it out alive. Collect orbs to increase health and syringes to increase adrenaline.

115114.name: Welt der Hunde
115114.description:
World of dogs
Which is the fastest dog in the world? Where the Cocker Spaniel gets its name? Here, players learn amazing facts about the most popular dog breeds.

There are 2 questions in each card with 3 answers for each questions. The winner is whoever can answer most questions correctly and thus can collect the most cards.
If the current player answers incorrectly the next player may risk with one of his collected card to answer it.

Contents:

32 large format cards with color photos

115115.name: Advena
115115.description:
Breathtaking Party Play Action RPG!
Two kingdoms lived peacefully in the land of Peradin: the magic users of the Nabe Alliance, and the common folk of Tems. But one day a Sacred Tree lying between their borders was found mysteriously desecrated. The two sides blamed each other, eventually leading to all out war.
Nabe struck first, but Tems was quick to answer. The forces of Nabe soon collapsed under the might of Tems, driving the Nabe King to seek the prophesized savior. And as foretold, a stranger from another world appeared in Nabe territory, with great powers and mystifying origins…

Source: The Developer Website.

115116.name: Auditorium
115116.description:
User Summary

Auditorium is an abstract puzzle game in which a stream of particles must be manipulated with tools on each level, which are movable and resizable circles, to cause the stream to cross various hot points on the screen. The basic tools will change the direction, and can be made stronger (and to have a larger range of manipulation) by increasing that tool's radius. Other specialized tools can do things like splitting the stream or changing its speed.

As well as hitting the hot spots, many levels also include colored areas, which are required to change the color of the stream to activate like colored hot spots.

In addition to being the goal, each hot spot is a track of a musical composition (which is different for each group of levels), and when it has been activated, it will play that track. When all the spots are active, you complete the level, and can, if you like, listen to the music playing before moving on to the next level.

115117.name: Wunder der Natur
115117.description:
"Wonders of nature" in English
The cards are divided into eight habitats: forests, lakes, rivers, mountain rain forests, savannas, steppes, deserts.
The habitats have different frame colors for clarity. For each habitat, there is one card each of the following five groups, ie a total of 5 cards: mammals, birds, amphibians and reptiles, spiders and insects, and plants. The aim of the game is to win by correctly answering the questions, all five cards of a habitat. For each question there are three possible answers,

115118.name: NOM 5
115118.description:
Experience retro style colorful sprites, fast-paced gameplay, and comical story of NOM.
Travel back-and-forth in space as guy and gal in NOM’s bizarre life.
STARTLINGLY IMAGINATIVE WORLDS
Dozens of stages which include 6 boss stages are presented in 10 vibrant and colorful interpretations of stars.
SIMPLE AND DYNAMIC ACTION
Easy one-touch control mechanism with riveting 360 degrees screen rotating action for an exciting journey through the space.
COLLECT RELICS AND GRAB SNACKS
Skid through the planets to collect relics and thump on bosses with snacks that give NOM superpower.
RACE, COMPETE AND UNLOCK
Sprint, swim, and jump as fast as you can to compete against others and unlock all 41 Game Center achievements.
WACKY ‘N’ COMICAL STORYLINE
Engage in the extraordinary journey of NOM becoming a 'gal' and her passion to become a ‘guy’ again!

Source: The Developer Website.

115119.description:
This is a set of additional Threat cards for the "Survival Camp" game. These cards were available exclusively to those who pledged to support the "Survival Camp" game project on Kickstarter.

The 5 Kickstarter Exclusive Threat Cards are:

GOLF BALL SIZED HAIL DESTROYS ALL OF YOUR DEFENSE UNLESS GUARDED.
ILLNESS STRIKES YOUR CAMP. DISCARD YOUR TENT IN FEAR OF CONTAMINATION.
RATS INFESTED YOUR CROPS. LOSE 1 COMPONENT OF YOUR GARDEN.
PACK OF HUNGRY DOGS THREATEN CROPS. FEED THEM YOUR GARDEN OR ELSE.
WATER WAS NOT PURIFIED PROPERLY. DISCARD ALL WATER COMPONENTS.




Add these extra threat cards into the deck with the other Threat cards to make the game a little more challenging.
115119.name: Survival Camp: Kickstarter Exclusive Threat Cards

115120.name: Welt der Katzen
115120.description:
World of cats
In which country cats were worshiped as gods? Why do cats eyes glow in the dark when light falls on them? How do cats orient in complete darkness? Interesting facts about cats.

There are 2 questions in each card with 3 answers for each questions. The winner is whoever can answer most questions correctly and thus can collect the most cards.
If the current player answers incorrectly the next player may risk with one of his collected card to answer it.

Contents:

32 large format cards with color photos

115121.name: Abenteuer Pferd
115121.description:
"Adventure horse" in English
When and why do horses neigh? What does a horse express when it strikes violently with its tail? Plenty of fun and eye-opening facts about horses.

There are 2 questions in each card with 3 answers for each questions. The winner is whoever can answer most questions correctly and thus can collect the most cards.
If the current player answers incorrectly, the next player may risk with one of his collected card to answer it.

Contents:

32 large format cards with color photos

115122.name: Faszination Pferd
115122.description:
"Fascination with horse" in English

There are 2 questions in each card with 3 answers for each questions. The winner is whoever can answer most questions correctly and thus can collect the most cards.
If the current player answers incorrectly the next player may risk with one of his collected card to answer it.

Contents:

32 large format cards with color photos

115123.name: Unglaublich, aber wahr!
115123.description:
"Unbelievable, but true!" in English
The cards are divided into eight habitats: forests, lakes, rivers, mountain rain forests, savannas, steppes, deserts.
The habitats have different frame colors for clarity. For each habitat, there is one card each of the following five groups, ie a total of 5 cards: mammals, birds, amphibians and reptiles, spiders and insects, and plants. The aim of the game is to win by correctly answering the questions, all five cards of a habitat. For each question there are three possible answers,

115124.name: Rekorde in der Luft
115124.description:
Records in the air
Trivia game on nature, on each card there are four questions, each with three possible answers, the players put chips on one of three answers and place their bet on any of the three betting cards with the corresponding response of the habitat.
The one who relies on an incorrect answer loses his chips. The players who have bet on the correct answer will receive back the double bet.

115125.name: Rätsel, Rekorde, Sensationen
115125.description:
"Puzzles, records, sensations" in English
Trivia game on nature, on each card there are four questions, each with three possible answers, the players put chips on one of three answers and place their bet on any of the three betting cards with the corresponding response of the habitat.
The one who relies on an incorrect answer loses his chips. The players who have bet on the correct answer will receive back the double bet.

115126.name: A Day at the Races
115126.description: An exciting card game of horse track racing, odds and wagering. Horses (cards) advance on the track (cards) each assigned odds of winning (based on card value) and wagers (punts) are made by the players before the race based on those odds. There are six races in a game and the player who wins the most "money" is the winner.

115127.name: Fara
115127.description:
Action RPG meets physics gameplay in a beautiful hand painted world.

AN ACTION RPG WITH INCREDIBLE PHYSICS GAMEPLAY!

Retro-inspired action RPG gameplay combines with full physics integration for a brand new experience. Control flaming ballistas, enormous battering rams and powerful magic in a dynamic environment full of quests, abilities, and items.

EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL HAND PAINTED WORLD!

The world of Fara is a giant, living canvas. Visit amazing locations that mix hand drawn artwork with a modern effects engine for a stunning new look.

AN EPIC QUEST FULL OF QUIRKY CHARACTERS!

Explore the island and meet its strange inhabitants. A cast of hilarious, weird, and entertaining characters drive the story along at a brisk pace.

INTUITIVE TOUCH CONTROLS BUILT FOR iOS!

Enjoy simple touch controls or a more traditional virtual pad for gameplay that was specifically created for the touch screen.

CLASSICAL COLLIDES WITH CHIPTUNE IN THE ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK!

Orchestral arrangements mix with vintage sounds for a score that is both familiar and innovative.

FULL GAME CENTER INTEGRATION WITH LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS!

Compete against your friends or challenge yourself with Leaderboards and Achievements.

Source: The Developer Website.

115128.description:
Following Dewey's naval victory, US Officials negotiated with Spain over the surrender of the Philippine capital, Manila, while simultaneously negotiating Filipino independence with Aguinaldo. When US forces occupied Manila, Aguanildo's own larger, and initially better armed veteran force squared off with McKinley's expeditionary force. There followed four years of "official hostilities" (Guerrilla activities dragged on for more than a decade after McKinley declared end to the war). Hostilities raged across the central island of Luzon and several other major island. After Aguinaldo's capture, his regular forces melted into the bush and US troops faced its first major guerrilla war in the Pacific. As with later foreign adventures, it was not a popular war at home.

Amigos and Insurrectos is an area movement game for two players (a US and a Filipino player). Three scenarios will be offered: an eight turn - STAND UP FIGHT, represents the clash of regular forces; an eight turn - INTO THE BUSH, representing the guerrilla phase of the conflict, and a 15 turn CAMPAIGN GAME, combining both. Regular forces will be represented on the regimental level. Abstract jungle movement will be available through guerrilla movement boxes and movement between islands will be possible though trans-island boxes. Originally designed as a Card-Driven game, random historical events will occur based on objective and turn based triggers. Victory will be based on a point swing track that in the extreme, could see Filipino collapse or US withdrawal. This is a topic shown very little attention in the gaming hobby. Luckily, Olivier has seen fit to feature it in the upcoming issue #11 of BATTLES MAGAZINE.
115128.name: Amigos and Insurrectos: The Philippine Insurrection 1899-1902
boardgamepodcastepisode: I've Been Diced! episode 56: John Poniske

115129.name: Unity of Command
videogamehonor: 2011 Charles S. Roberts Best 20th Century Era - Modern Computer Wargame Nominee
2011 Charles S. Roberts Best Computer Game Graphics Nominee
115129.description:
In 1942, a titanic struggle is reaching its climax in the boundless, trackless expanses of southern Russia. The stakes cannot be higher as you take command of battle-hardened Wehrmacht or massive Red Army forces to decide the fate of an entire continent.

Unity of Command lets you replay the epic conflict that was the Stalingrad Campaign of World War II. In this turn-based game of strategy and cunning, observe how opportunity leads the German army to advance recklessly into the steppes of southern Russia. And as the story unfolds, join the Soviet campaign to repel the invaders... As these legendary battles play out on the hex board, the tension of decision making and difficulties of conducting operations on a massive scale emerge. Command armies and fronts in maneuver warfare, thrust and encircle, capture cities and cross continents; but never, ever forget to watch your supply lines.

Experience the highly fluid, enormously large battles of maneuver in a turn-based strategy setting. Take command in this mobile, back-and-forth sort of war where logistics and poor weather are often the decider, and defeat and victory are sometimes just a mile, or a day, apart.

Winner Usenet's Wargame of the Year Awards 2011 - Bronze

Source: The Publisher Website.

115130.name: Pig Shot
115130.description:
Pig Shot is an incredibly addicting action game where you constantly launch your pig off slingshots before rolling it at high speed through a challenging trail that is filled with random obstacles. Collect cauliflower to accumulate gas and make your pig fart for a temporary speed boost.

Source: The Developer Website.

115131.name: The Exiled Realm of Arborea
115131.description:
The Exiled Realm of Arborea will have typical MMORPG features such as quests, crafting and player versus player action. Combat uses a "real-time battle system" that incorporates third person camera view. The player targets an enemy with a cross-hair cursor rather than clicking or tabbing an individual opponent (this is called the Non-Target battle system" by the publisher). Players must actively dodge enemy attacks. The player may use keyboard and mouse, or an Xbox 360 Controller to control their character.

Source: Wikipedia, "The Exiled Realm of Arborea", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115132.name: Protonaut
115132.description:
User Summary

Play as a nanobot collecting elements. The elements behave differently from one another. Oxygen is the primary molecule you will be collecting. Some are unstable like nitrogen and should be avoided. Iron is too heavy to be collected. Carbon does not need to be collected, but it can be. Hydrogen is so light it floats. You can shoot at chemicals to effect them, jump and wall jump. Bonds will cause the molecules to behave differently.

115133.name: John Sinclair: Der Erbe des Templers
rpgissuearticle: Geisterjäger John Sinclair 3 - Das Erbe des Templers
115133.description:
Summary from Publisher Blurb:

The hunt for the heralds goes on...

This is the 2nd adventure module for John Sinclair. This is the next part of the story that began in the core rules. This book continues the campaign about the herald-circle and the "Black Death".

This book contains 3 complete adventures and some new equipment, monsters, additional rules and a great background part.

115134.name: ABBA: You Can Dance
115134.description:
ABBA: You Can Dance is a video game for the Wii, developed by Ubisoft. It was announced in 1 September 2011, and was released on 25 November 2011 in Europe and 15 November 2011 in North America. The game is a spin-off of the Just Dance series.

Source: Wikipedia, "ABBA: You Can Dance", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115135.name: Ace Combat: Assault Horizon
115135.description:
Ace Combat: Assault Horizon is an installment of the Ace Combat arcade combat flight video game series developed by Project Aces and published by Namco Bandai for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. The major new gameplay feature is a system called "Close-Range Assault" (CRA), which aims to increase the intensity and bring the action closer to the player, without the feeling of "shooting at faraway dots" commonly seen in flight games. In the game, it is named "Dogfight Mode" (DFM) for air-to-air battles and "Air Strike Mode" (ASM) for air-to-ground targets. They are not optional, as certain planes cannot be destroyed without CRA. To initiate DFM, the player taps LB+RB on the Xbox 360 and L2+R2 on the PS3 when they have gotten close enough to the plane they are targeting. ASM is initiated by pressing the same buttons at specific points around the map.

Also new to the series are attack helicopter missions, stealth bomber missions, and levels where the player controls a Black Hawk door gunner and an AC-130.

A new multiplayer mode called "Capital Conquest" involves two teams of 8 vs. 8 where each team takes turns either defending or attacking a world capital, such as Paris and Washington, D.C.. In this mode, fighters, attackers, attack helicopters, and bombers can fly together simultaneously. Each type of aircraft will have its advantages and disadvantages, having specific roles in the battlefield.

Source: Wikipedia, "Ace Combat: Assault Horizon", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115136.name: John Sinclair: Verfluchtes Atlantis
115136.description:
Summary from Publisher Blurb:

The hunt for the heralds goes on...

This is the 3rd adventure module for John Sinclair. This is the last part of the story that began in the core rules. This book ends the campaign about the herald-circle and the "Black Death".
This book contains 3 complete adventures and some new equipment, and additional rules.

115137.name: John Sinclair:  SL-Schirm (Erzählerschirm)
115137.description:
User Summary:

The Gamemaster Screen for the RPG John Sinclair.

It contains a useful rules summary and tables of equipment and items.

115138.name: Ace Combat: Assault Horizon Legacy
115138.description:
Ace Combat: Assault Horizon Legacy (Ace Combat 3D: Cross Rumble in Japan) is an action video game for the Nintendo 3DS which is developed by Project Aces and published by Namco Bandai Games. First impressions of the game was released by the Official Nintendo Magazine in July 2011 and was also leaked by IGN in the same month.

Source: Wikipedia, "Ace Combat: Assault Horizon Legacy", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115139.name: Amnesty: The Game
115139.description:
Amnesty - the game is a serious game created in order to support Amnesty International efforts to worldwide abolish the death penalty.

The game is a volunteer project, created from Hellenic Game Developers Association (HGDA) members in collaboration with Amnesty International Greek department.

The game focuses on six key countries that still retain the death penalty (USA, China, Mongolia, Belarus, Saudi Arabia and Iran). The user takes the role of a special amnesty international agent that must coordinate his actions and resources in order to convince the public opinion and the Government of each country to abolish the death penalty. In each of the six countries, a convicted to death prisoner awaits his execution and the user must abolish the death penalty on time in order to save his life.

While playing, the user can find information about Amnesty International actions around the world and how he can help to worldwide abolish the death penalty in the real world.

The game plays on any internet browser and on facebook so that the user can inform and invite his friends to play also.

Source: Wikipedia, "Amnesty the game", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115140.name: QuibeLand Evolution
115140.description:
User Summary

Quibeland Evolution gives you much tougher enemies, you are a black box rather than red, you stand still when hurt rather than beginning level over. You must jump on top of item boxes to get them. You still collect coins for points. Press the space bar to attack.

115141.name: QuibeLand
115141.description:
User Summary

Play as a red cube with a sword. Attack enemies with your sword, jump over obstacles, collect all the money you can. Getting hurt or falling of a ledge will cause you to restart the level immediately. You will get level codes along the way so you don't have to restart the whole game.

115142.name: Raft Wars
115142.description:
User Summary

Three year old Simon is playing on the beach when he discovers gold and diamonds in the sand. Word gets out, and pirates decide to attack. It is up to you and your older brother to fend off the pirates with tennis balls, grenades and rockets. You will be in rafts, the pirates on their boats. You will take turns firing at each other, trying to either knock into water or reduce hp to 0.

115143.name: Rage (Browser)
115143.description:
User Summary

Control a stick figure on the attack. Attack all enemies, as you do your rage meter will increase until you burst into flames and are enraged. Continue to fight to keep stay enraged. Collect coins and weapons. High level of violence.

115144.name: Rage 2
115144.description:
User Summary

In Rage two, you once again play as a stick figure who becomes enraged from fighting. In this version it is easier to keep your rage meter high, the graphics are smoother, your character jumps much higher. Play in Arcade mode as well as Adventure mode.

115145.name: Word Slinger
115145.description:
Puzzle and word game lovers rejoice! Word Slinger is everything you've been looking for! Combining elements from word game classics, the makers of GameHouse Word Collection have created an unforgettable and addictive gaming experience. Try your hand at two exciting modes: Speed and Strategy. Don't let the list of words reach the top in Speed mode. Take your time to plan each move in Strategy mode. Packed with bonuses and power-ups, Word Slinger will have you hooked!

Source: The Game Website.

115146.name: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Alpha Playtest
rpghonor: 2008 ENnie for Best Free Product - Gold Winner
115146.description:
User summary:

This is the initial version of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game, released as the game was announced and freely available for public playtest while Paizo developed the more complete Beta version. It focused on the changes from the Dungeons & Dragons (3.5 Edition) envisioned for the Pathfinder RPG and (unlike the final game) did not contain the complete set of rules necessary for play. The rules presented here have substantial differences from the final game.

115147.name: Double Pack Farm Frenzy 2 and Farm Frenzy - Pizza Party
115147.description:
The ranch house ruckus gets a double dose of fun with this splendid set of games. Spend a day or two at the farm with the title that introduced new animals, upgrades, and even more surprises than the original with Farm Frenzy 2. In Farm Frenzy Pizza Party, making pizza is the name of the game with even more levels, goods, and fun challenges.

A total of 180 frantic levels await you as you care for farm animals. Collect their produce, and send it off to market for a big profit. Use your earnings to upgrade your buildings, transportation, and more! Short on supplies? Send your plane to pick up what you need and be careful of those ravenous bears.

Source: The Game Website.

115148.name: Rage 3
115148.description:
User Summary

A stick figure grows angry as it fights, until becoming enraged. This game features items and areas that unlock as you gain levels. You also have the ability to carry multiple melee weapons and toggle through them. High level of violence.

115150.name: Avernum: Escape from the Pit
115150.description:
From the publisher's website:

Spiderweb Software returns to its epic creation, to tell a story of imprisonment, rebellion, and the struggle for freedom against overwhelming odds. Avernum: Escape From the Pit is the first chapter in an Indie fantasy role-playing saga, the tale of desperate exiles and their battle for survival and a land to call their own.

115151.name: Beginner Box Bash: Relics
115151.description:
From the introduction:

Beginner Box Bash: Relics is a Pathfinder RPG Beginner Box demo adventure for 4–6 Beginner Box characters of 1st level. It is meant to be run as part of the Beginner Box Bash special event, but can be run as a stand-alone demo of the game at other events as well. Players are encouraged to use the provided pregenerated characters, but may create their own 1st-level player characters if time permits at your event. Aside from the map, everything you need to run this demo can be found in the Pathfinder RPG Beginner Box.

Hundreds of years ago, select priests of Aroden carried ornate ceremonial scepters known as shepherd’s crosiers. These signs of authority granted the high-ranking clergy diplomatic immunity even during the civil wars that tore across southern Avistan. One such scepter is rumored to lie in an ancestral vault near Sandpoint, and the family who owns the vault has fallen on hard times.

115153.name: Beginner Box Bash: Ruins
115153.description:
From the introduction:

Beginner Box Bash: Ruins RPG Beginner Box demo adventure for 4–6 Beginner Box characters of 1st level. It is meant to be run as part of the Beginner Box Bash special event, but can be run as a stand-alone demo of the game at other events as well. Players are encouraged to use the provided pregenerated characters, but may create their own 1st-level player characters if time permits at your event. Aside from the map, everything you need to run this demo can be found in the Pathfinder RPG Beginner Box.

Having purchased information from a roving band of Varisian wanderers coming through Absalom, the Pathfinder Society has tasked the PCs with investigating a set of ruins in northern Varisia. Believing the site to be a lost Thassilonian outpost, the Society wants the PCs to bring back any artifacts relating to the ancient culture.

115154.name: Beginner Box Bash: Terrors
115154.description:
From the introduction:

Beginner Box Bash: Terrors is a Pathfinder RPG Beginner Box demo adventure for 4–6 Beginner Box characters of 1st level. It is meant to be run as part of the Beginner Box Bash special event, but can be run as a stand-alone demo of the game at other events as well. Players are encouraged to use the provided pregenerated characters, but may create their own 1st-level player characters if time permits at your event. Aside from the map, everything you need to run this demo can be found in the Pathfinder RPG Beginner Box.

The player characters are sent by visiting Pathfinder Society Venture-Captain Sheila Heidmarch from Sandpoint into the Varisian town of Galduria to investigate rumors of an undead uprising. There, they must question the townsfolk before venturing into the cemetery late at night to confront the menace head-on.

115155.name: Ice Cream Craze - Tycoon Takeover
115155.description:
Choose your own path to sweet success in Ice Cream Craze - Tycoon Takeover, an amazing time management game that lets you play your way! Titan of the dessert industry, BigCo, has long held a monopoly on delicious treats in your city. But that was before you came along! Cruise around town in your truck, partner with local business owners, expand your operations by completing unique challenges, and earn new features and upgrades to turn your enterprise into an empire! When you're ready, take on BigCo in a battle for ice cream supremacy! Featuring an original, "choose your own adventure" style of gameplay, an assortment of quirky customers, more than 100 levels, and a whole lot more, Ice Cream Craze - Tycoon Takeover is a sweet treat for gamers of all ages. Play the Ice Cream Craze - Tycoon Takeover free, or try the free Ice Cream Craze - Tycoon Takeover download version and enjoy a heaping scoop of original fun, with all the toppings, today!

Source: The Game Website.

115156.name: Beginner Box Bash: Tomes
115156.description:
From the introduction:

Beginner Box Bash: Tomes is a Pathfinder RPG Beginner Box demo adventure for 4–6 Beginner Box characters of 1st level. It is meant to be run as part of the Beginner Box Bash special event, but can be run as a stand-alone demo of the game at other events as well. Players are encouraged to use the provided pregenerated characters, but may create their own 1st-level player characters if time permits at your event. Aside from the map, everything you need to run this demo can be found in the Pathfinder RPG Beginner Box.

115157.name: CDTV
115157.description:
The CDTV (an acronym for "Commodore Dynamic Total Vision", a backronym of an acronym for "Compact Disk Television", giving it a double meaning) was a multimedia platform developed by Commodore International and launched in 1991. On a technological level it was essentially a Commodore Amiga 500 home computer in a Hi-Fi style case with a single-speed CD-ROM drive. Commodore marketed the machine as an all-in-one home multimedia appliance rather than a computer. As such, it targeted the same market as the Philips CD-i. Unfortunately for both Commodore and Philips, the expected market for multimedia appliances did not materialise, and neither machine met with any real commercial success. Though the CDTV was based entirely on Amiga hardware it was marketed strictly as a CDTV, with the Amiga name omitted from product branding.

Source: Wikipedia, "Commodore CDTV", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115158.name: Snoopy in: The Case of the Missing Blanket
115158.description:
User Summary
Snoopy in: The Case of the Missing Blanket is an adventure game where Snoopy most solve some puzzles so he can find his lost blanket.

115159.name: Ray Ardent Science Ninja
115159.description:
User Summary

A high speed platformer. Collect spinning balls of X6 which give Ray his super powers. Each level can be replayed to attempt to earn a higher star rating. Equip different power ups as they become unlocked.

115160.name: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Character Traits Web Enhancement
115160.description:
From the introduction:

This document contains all the rules you need to use character traits in your campaign, be they Pathfinder Adventure Paths or campaigns of your own design.

115161.name: Red Dragon Rampage
115161.description:
User Summary

A defense game. Enemies are attacking your family.
Control a young dragon protecting his dad. Pick up enemies as they approach, or attack them. Protect your dad's health. Upgrade your defense with workers, or upgrade your own abilities or buy weapons and fences to protect.

115162.name: Tower Bloxx Deluxe
115162.description:
Reach for the skies in this wacky skyscraper construction game! In Tower Bloxx Deluxe, your task is to build brand new homes for the Tower Toons – funny little people who move in and turn the lights on before they even have a roof over their heads!
In the “Play Story” mode the mayor A.Z. Millspaugh and city architect Ava Dandelion of Sycamore Vale has asked you, a renowned tower builder, to quickly help in rebuilding the city since the old residences are falling apart. Luckily your amazing building block system is perfect for the job! And you have Ava to guide you all the way!
In Quick Game mode your goal is to make your tower as high as possible and only your improving building skills set the limit to how high you can really go. In Time Challenge mode you get to see how well you do under pressure. In Party Game mode up to four people can build towers on the same machine with split-screen fun!

Source: The Developer Website.

115163.name: Airborne Assault: Red Devils Over Arnhem
115163.description:
Take command of the British "red devils" airborne forces, seize the Rhine crossings and end the war before christmas 1944 in this operational level, real time, single and multi player wargame. Develop plans, issue orders and react to enemy threats as you fight one of the most daring battles of World War 2. Available for PC Windows.

Source: The Developer Website.

115165.name: Snapshot (Browser)
115165.description:
Test your memory with the stars. A quick glance and off you go. Click on matching pictures and beat the clock. Easy? Take on the challenge and beat your fellow gamers.

Source: The Game Website.

115166.name: Fifteens
115166.description:
Try to clear the board as quickly as you can by removing combinations of cards. You can remove 4 kings, 4 queens, 4 jacks or 4 tens. Other cards can be removed by making a combination of 15 points.

Source: The Game Website.

115167.name: Mixed Up
115167.description:
This puzzle will surprise you over and over again. New shapes and challenges will come your way. Enjoy the view... but remember the clock is ticking.

Source: The Game Website.

115168.name: Snake Escape
115168.description:
Eat the food, but be careful not to bite yourself. Needless to say that the walls are not very well digested by this faster and faster moving snake..

Source: The Game Website.

115169.name: AND 1 Streetball
115169.description:
AND 1 Streetball is a game released in conjunction with the AND1 Mixtape Tour. A scaled-down, mobile version of the game, developed by Gameloft, was also released.

While not the first game to feature AND 1 players, 'AND 1 Streetball is officially licensed by the company, and includes the 2005 AND 1 roster as well as Duke Tango, AND 1's MC for its annual Mix Tape Tours.

The game features a story mode mirroring the "Streetball" series on ESPN, where players are able to create their own basketball player and enter him in the AND 1 Mix Tape Tour in order to get a contract with the AND 1 team. Along the way, players are able to create their own stylized trick moves and pull them off with a two-analog stick system called "I BALL."

The PlayStation 2 version supports multiplayer via multitap and GameSpy, while the Xbox version includes Xbox Live support.

Source: Wikipedia, "AND 1 Streetball", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115170.name: Antz Extreme Racing
115170.description:
Antz Extreme Racing is a racing video game based on a computer-animated film Antz. The game was developed by Magic Pockets and released by Light & Shadow Production in 2002 for Game Boy Advance, PlayStation 2, Microsoft Windows and Xbox.

Source: Wikipedia, "Antz Extreme Racing", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115175.name: Strange Cases: The Lighthouse Mystery
115175.description:
User Summary

Strange Cases: The Lighthouse Mystery is the sequel to Strange Cases: The Tarot Card Mystery, and is an Adventure and Hidden Object game in which FBI Agent Claire Ellery must now delve into the mystery of her Partner's death, following the trail of clues that her partner, Tom, himself has left.

115176.name: Strange Cases: The Tarot Card Mystery
115176.description:
User Summary

Strange Cases: The Tarot Card Mystery is an Adventure and Hidden Object puzzle game in which you take on the role of FBI Agent Claire Ellery as she investigates a triple kidnapping in a small town. Follow the tarot cards left by an anonymous source as you help Agent Ellery rescue the kidnapped girls.

115177.name: Driving Tigers (Vol 1,  No 1 - Winter 1991)
rpgissuearticle: THE SECRET LIFE OF A REPO MAN
The Year The Indy Died (Part 1 of 2)
115177.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Editorial Page (C. J. Burke), THE SECRET LIFE OF A REPO MAN (Robert Garitta), HIGHWAY 13 (Ben Carter), PAYBACK (Christopher Burke), & THE YEAR THE INDY DIED, Part 1 of 2 (P. M. Fergusson).

115180.name: Strange Cases: The Secrets of Grey Mist Lake
115180.description:
User Summary

The Secrets of Grey Mist Lake is the third in the Strange Cases series of Adventure and Hidden Object Puzzle games. Once again follow FBI Agent Claire Ellery as her vacation with husband Sam turns into an investigation of yet another Strange Case.

115181.name: Driving Tigers (Vol 1, No 2 - Spring 1991)
rpgissuearticle: THE YEAR THE INDY DIED (Part 2 of 2),
115181.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Editorial Page (C. J. Burke), EPILOGUE (Robert Garitta), CRASH TEST (Christopher Burke), JERSEY DEVIL (Ed Tunis III as told to Charlotte Webster), THE HORDE (Joel Mullins), & THE YEAR THE INDY DIED, Part 2 of 2 (P. M. Fergusson)

115182.name: Driving Tigers (Vol 1,  No 3 - Summer 1991)
rpgissuearticle: SOMETHING OLD, SOMETHING NEW, SOMETHING BORROWED AND REPO BLUES
115182.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Editorial Page (C. J. Burke), RANGER KILL (Steph Burke), SOMETHING OLD, SOMETHING NEW, SOMETHING BORROWED, AND REPO BLUES (Robert Garitta & Ray Keegan), BIGGER THAN BIGOTRY (Tiv Lucas-Gates), HAWKS AND DOVES (Christopher Burke), THE GUIDE TO EXPLOITIVE ARTWORK, PUZZLE PAGE, & LETTERS.

115183.name: Hyper 3D Pinball
115183.description:
User Summary

Hyper 3D pinball is a pinball simulator released initially for the PC. It comes with six original tables, each with their own modes, bonuses, and score tables. It also had several different views, going from an isometric view that shows the entire table, to a top down view showing only the portion of the table the ball is on.

115184.name: Driving Tigers (Vol 1,  No 4 - Autumn/Winter 1991)
115184.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Editorial Page (C. J. Burke), EARLY RETIREMENT (Ben Carter), WORKHORSE (C. J. Burke), TINKER'S DAM (Robert Garitta), RESURRECTION, Part 1 of 2 (Steph Burke), THE THREE BEARS (C. J. Burke), & LETTERS.

115185.description:
This PDF was a promotional item released only to the game's backers on Kickstarter in conjunction with a contest held by the game's creator.

The Fire Academy Challenge is a series of scripted "puzzles". The objective is the same: to rescue at least seven trapped victims before the fire kills four or the building collapses.

Included are sheets to log your progress through each of the puzzles along with a scoring system designed to allow groups to match their scores to other teams.
115185.name: Flash Point: Fire Rescue – Fire Academy Challenge

115186.name: Driving Tigers (Vol 1,  No 5 - Spring 1992)
rpgissuearticle: THE ROBIN HOOD OF BLACK ROCK
115186.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Editorial Page (C. J. Burke), SENTIMENTAL VALUE (C. J. Burke), ROBIN HOOD OF BLACK ROCK (Ben Carter), RESURRECTION, Part 2 of 2 (Steph Burke), THE VOTES ARE IN: THE BEST OF 1991, & LETTERS.

115187.name: Beyond Shadowgate
115187.description:
Beyond Shadowgate is a TurboGrafx CD sequel to the 1987 Mac and MacVenture Shadowgate. Unlike its predecessor, Beyond Shadowgate is a classical point-and-click adventure viewed from a platform perspective. The player controls Prince Erik, the descendant of the hero from the first game, Lord Jair. When Prince Erik returns to his home country, he finds out about his father's murder. The Prince is framed by the minister of the late king, who imprisons him where the adventure starts.

As in Shadowgate, the player must solve a series of puzzles throughout the castle in order to proceed to the end of the game. Prince Erik can move around, examine, manipulate, and take objects. Commands also allow ducking and punching. Traps and puzzles along the game may cause sudden death of the character, if the puzzles and game elements are not correctly solved. Throughout the game, the player has the opportunity to meet his untimely demise; be it at the bloodied guillotine or at the mere act of peering into a gaping hole in the wall, only to find yourself face to face with a man-eating plant. In the end, one will need a sense of patience, and a sense of humor, if they intend to see the adventure through to the end.

Source: Wikipedia, "Beyond Shadowgate", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115188.name: RIP - Trilogy
115188.description:
With the completion of the third title in the RIP series, the RIP games have become an instant classic in the arcade-shooter genre. RIP - Trilogy brings all three RIP titles into one exciting and heart-pounding pack.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115189.name: Singstar Pop Vol 2
115189.description:
User Summary

Singstar Pop 2 features 30 new songs and music videos for the Singstar karaoke franchise. Songs include When I'm Gone by 3 Doors Down, Ordinary World by Duran Duran, Littlest Things by Lily Allen, Don't Know Why by Norah Jones, and Into the Night with Santana (featuring Chad Kroger), among others. Requires SingStar microphone and USB Converter to play (not included).

115190.name: SingStar Country
115190.description:
User Summary

A country-themed expansion for the SingStar karoake series, featuring artists including Brad Paisley, Faith Hill, Johnny Cash, Taylor Swift, Willie Nelson, and more. This version features one-on-one versus multiplayer and is compatible with the EyeToy camera, which you can use to record and playback your singing performances.

115191.name: Anima Tactics: Alessa Raincross
115191.description:
As one of The Crows of Wissenchaft and armed with Lost Loggia weapons, Alessa has become a prominent agent of Lucanor Giovanni. Thanks to the powers that she has received through continuous experiments and magical implants, her aim and physical aptitudes have become truly inhuman.

Dark Wissenschaft Prowler - Lv. 45

At 4 | Dm 4 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP 10 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4

Innate Abilities: Ranged Attack (16 inch), Alessa can have two advantage cards attached to her.

oo - Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
Alessa becomes Hidden. Upkeep o

ooo - Dark Sniper (Subterfuge, Ranged Attack)
Distance (24 inch), +5 attack, -4 armor. This attack can not be intercepted by the shield maneuver to avoid reaching its target. This skill can only be used if Alessa is Hidden.

oooo - Storm Waltz (Subterfuge, Ranged Attack)
Distance (5 inch). Alessa executes four attacks to a single target unit.

115192.name: Anima Tactics: Celia
115192.description:
One of the legendary assassins of the Selene order, Celia has thrown away her dark past in order to be with her new companions of the Conclave under the supervision of Lucanor Giovanni. Marked as a traitor by Selene, she now must survive being hunted by her previous friends.

Neutral Wissenschaft Warrior - Lv. 50

At 5 | Dm 3 | Df 10 | Ar 0 | LP: 12 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/4

Innate Abilities: Celia can have two Advantage Cards attached to her.
(added on second printing)

oo - Neokinesis (Ki, Effect)
Celia gains Lv2 Haste.

oo - Mirror Stance (Ki, Dodge)

+ 5 Defense.

ooo - Tear of Illusions (Ki, Attack)

+ 5 Attack.

115193.name: Anima Tactics: Cordelia Rosalind
115193.description:
With Cordelia’s enhanced senses and armed with the latest Wissenchaft technology, she is the best sniper throughout all of Gaïa.

Dark Wissenschaft Prowler - Lv. 45

At 4 | Dm 1 | Df 8 | Ar 0 | LP: 9 | Re 10 | Mo 6/10 | AP 3/4

Innate Abilities: Advanced Deployment, Cordelia may have two Advantage Cards attached to her.

oo - Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
Cordelia becomes Hidden.
Upkeep: o

oo - Dark Sniper (Subterfuge, Ranged Attack)
Distance (20 inches). +1 Attack / +4 Damage / -2 Armor. This skill can only be used if Cordelia is Hidden.

ooo - Hollow Bullet (Subterfuge, Ranged Attack)
Distance (20 inches). +4 Attack / +4 Damage / -4 Armor. This skill can only be used if Cordelia is Hidden.

ooo - Vortex Shot (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (16 inches). +2 Attack / +5 Damage. If this Attack hits the target, all units within 2 inches of the target character also suffer the Attack.

115194.name: Anima Tactics: Feng Yi
115194.description:
Feng Yi was a prominent agent of the Selene Order, well recognised by her remarkable martial skills as well as her friendly behaviour. After her apparent death at the hands of the High Inquisitor Lostaroth, she was saved by the Wissenchaft Researcher Reist Ebersbacher, thus becoming a member of his mysterious organization. Now, Feng's loyalty is split between her former companions and the people to whom she owes her life.

Neutral Wissenschaft Warrior - Lv. 40

At 5 | Dm 2 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP: 10 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/5

Innate Abilities: Feng Yi may have two Advantage Cards attached to her.

oo - First Stand: Xian Wu Jian (Ki, Attack)
-1 Damage.

o - Second Stand: San Hua (Ki, Attack)

+ 1 Attack / +1 Damage. This attack may only be executed following a successful hit with Xian Wu Jian.

o - Third Stand: Jing Niao (Ki, Attack)

+ 2 Attack / +2 Damage. This attack may only be executed following a successful hit with San Hua.

o - Final Stand: Yan Feng (Ki, Attack)

+ 3 Attack / +3 Damage. This attack may only be executed following a successful hit with Jing Niao.

115195.name: Pixel Panic
115195.description:
Reveal more and more parts of the secret image by moving your droid along the sides of the rectangles. But beware of the enemies who try to catch you!

Source: The Game Website.

115197.name: Junior Millionen Quiz
115197.description:
Objective:
be the first to climb up 20 spaces reaching the top (golden area) giving correct answers on multiple-choice questions (1 out of 4)
- acting by turn -
determine the difficulty level first (easy, moderate, difficult)
each player is asked a question:
if answer is right ==> step forewards; wrong ==> step backwards

3.300 questions (standard edition) out of:
> heaven & earth
> animals & nature
> technique
> sports & games
> fairy tales & stories
> wild mixture

115198.name: Accelerator
videogameversion: UK ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115198.description:
User Summary

Space shooter where you operate a small spacecraft and shoot everything coming at you. View is sideways. For one player only, game supports a joystick.

115199.name: Twin Touch
115199.description:
Make pairs of matching tiles and explore new layouts. The pairs should be connectable by a straight line with at most two corners.

Source: The Game Website.

115200.name: Ace Low
videogameversion: UK ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115200.description:
From the cassette inlay

You have to decide whether the next card dealt is higher or lower than the last card dealt. You start with 10 pounds and each turn costs 1 pound. If you correctly forecast nine cards in succession, you win 5. If the next card dealt is the same value as the last card you win whether you forecast it to be higher or lower. Can you play your cards right?

115201.name: Pharao's Classic Solitaire
115201.description:
Clear the pyramids as fast as you can by removing the cards. You can remove a card when it is one higher or lower than the card on the pile.

Source: The Game Website.

115203.name: Balls 'n Walls
115203.description:
Over a hundred levels of pure brick breaking fun! Simply bounce your ball back with your paddle to break down the wall. Collect bonus items to upgrade your paddle and try to find the exit in each level to progress through the game.

Source: The Game Website.

115204.name: Acorazado
videogameversion: Spanish ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115204.description:
User Summary

Player operates a submerged submarine which can fire vertically up. On the surface, the enemy navy drops depth charges to destroy your boat. Sink them or be sunk.

115205.name: Anima Tactics: Goethia
115205.description:
Goethia is the most modern of the Combat Gears developed by Wissenchaft. Using the science of the Lost Logias, this artifact of destruction is capable of devastating entire armies with its powerful technomagic weapons.

Neutral Wissenschaft Warrior/Mystic- Lv. 50+

At 5 | Dm 5 | Df 8 | Ar 4 | LP 25 | Re 10 | Mo 6/10 | AP Varies/4

Innate Abilities: Ranged Attack (16 inches), Flight, Immunity (Poison), Damage Resistance.
Homing Lasers: Goethia's Ranged Attacks do not require Line of Sight. If Goethia cannot draw Line of Sight to a target, then it applies the penalty for Hard Cover to its Attack. This ability may not be used to target Hidden Units.

ooo - Goethe (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (12 inches), +1 Attack / +1 Damage. If this Attack hits its target, then all Characters within 2 inches of the target also suffer the Attack. Goethe is not affected by the Homing Lasers rule.

ooo - Calamity Rain (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (16 inches). Goethia makes three consecutive Ranged Attacks. Each Attack must target a different unit, or it cannot be made. Limit: Once per game.

Goethia - Pilot

Gear: A Gear cannot have Advantage cards associated and you must select a Pilot for it. The cost of the Pilot is added to the Gear's Level. The Pilot selected for a Gear determines the number of Actions Points it will recover per Turn and may give additional abilities.

Unique Pilot: The same Pilot cannot be selected more than once in the same party, regardless of the Gear he is in.

Technomagical Powered Armor: You can take any number of Goethia Gears in your party, as long as you follow the Unique Pilot rule.

Valeria Strauss - Lv. +10
Recharge: 3
Innate Abilities: Advanced Deployment.
Indomitable: Goethia increases its Speed by 2 inches.

Frederick Mausser - Lv. +15
Recharge: 3
Marksmanship: Goethia obtains +1 Attack to its Ranged Attacks.
Aimed Shot: If Goethia doesn't use any Movement during its activation, it gets +1 Attack to its Ranged Attacks that Turn. This bonus stacks with Marksmanship.

Edgard Ivanesku - Lv. +0
Recharge: 2

115206.name: Anima Tactics: Grimorium Verum
115206.description:
Grimorium is the heaviest Combat Gear model developed by Wissenchaft. Almost unstoppable, this Lost Logias weapon enters the battlefield to annihilate everything in his path.

Neutral Wissenschaft Warrior/Mystic- Lv. 55+

At 4 | Dm 8 | Df 7 | Ar 6 | LP 35 | Re 10 | Mo 6/10 | AP Varies/4

Innate Abilities:Damage Resistance, Immunity (Poison).
Armor Piercing: Any hand-to-hand Attack made by Grimorium ignores 2 points of the defender's Armor.

oo+ - Exodia Cannon (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (8 inches). For each additional Action Point spent, Exodia Cannon attack gets 4 inches of additional Distance and +2 Damage.

ooo - Magus Burst (Magic, Charge)
If this Charge hits its target, Grimorium makes a new Attack on every Unit (except the Charge target) within 2 inches of itself. Each new Attack must be rolled separately as a normal Hand-to-hand Attack (they don't get any of the Charge bonus).

ooo - Veritas (Magic, Attack)
Veritas affects all enemy Units within 2 inches of Grimorium.

Grimorium - Pilot

Gear: A Gear cannot have Advantage cards associated and you must select a Pilot for it. The cost of the Pilot is added to the Gear's Level. The Pilot selected for a Gear determines the number of Actions Points it will recover per Turn and may give additional abilities.

Unique Pilot: The same Pilot cannot be selected more than once in the same party, regardless of the Gear he is in.

Technomagical Powered Armor: You can take any number of Grimorium Gears in your party, as long as you follow the Unique Pilot rule.

Reist Ebersbacher - Lv. +25
Recharge: ooo
Innate Abilities: Initiative.
As Pilot: Grimorium obtains +1 Attack, +1 Defense, +2 Resistance and Critical Mastery.
Leader: Grimorium becomes a Leader.

Frederick Mausser - Lv. +15
Recharge: ooo
Marksmanship: Grimorium obtains +1 Attack to its Ranged Attacks.
Aim Shot: If Grimorium doesn't use any Movement during its activation, it gets +1 Attack to its Ranged Attacks that Turn. This bonus stacks with Marksmanship.

Steiner Wenzel - Lv. +5
Recharge: oo
Repairs: Grimorium may spend 1 Action Point each Turn during its Activation to recover 5 Life Points.
Additional Armor: Grimorium gets +1 Armor.

115207.name: Anima Tactics: Hecatondies Zero Sigma
115207.description:
Neutral Wissenschaft Mystic Warrior Leader - Lv. 80

At 7 | Dm 6 | Df 9 | Ar 4 | LP: 18 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/5

Innate Abilities: Flight, Immunity (Poison)

Technomagical Golem: Zero is a Gear and thus can't be assigned Advantage Cards

o - Prehensile Tail (Ki, Attack)
This attack causes no damage. If it hits the target suffers Paralyze Lv. 1 effect 15. Limit: Once per turn

oo - Code-34: Execution (Ki, Attack)

+ 5 damage. This attack can only be used on a Paralyzed Character

ooo - Code-11: Destroyer Dome (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance 16". If this Attack hits its target, then all units within 2" of the target also suffer the attack.

ooo - Force Shield (Ki, Attack)

+ 3 Attack. This attack causes Throw

ooooo - Code-66 Terminus (Ki, Charge)

+ 3 Attack / +2 Damage

Power Cells

At the Start of the game put 3 "Energy" tokens on this card. Once per turn, as a reaction, you may spend 1 energy token from this card to have Zero gain 1 of the following bonuses until the end of the turn:

Code -11: Destroyer Dome gets +2 Damage and will affect units within 4" of the target instead of 2".
Code-34 Execution cost is reduced by 1 Action Point.
Code-66: Terminus causes Throw and ignores the defender's armor.

115208.name: Das 6600 Fragen-Quiz
115208.description:
Objective: be the first to gain 8 different coloured chips
- acting by turn -
due to (limited) no. of meeples you have to build teams if more than 6 players are participating
roll the die, move your meeple - landing on a coloured space (outer ring only) your left neighbour has to draw a (colour corresponding) card and challenges you with a question - appropiate your previous roll ==> '6' = free choice - out of following terms:
miscellaneous, history & politics, nature/enviroment, heaven & earth, technique & science, stort/games, fairy tales & sagas (incl. movies, music, riddles), arts & culture;
if your answer is correct you may throw the die again.

115209.name: Anima Tactics: Legacy Of Solomon
115209.description:
The artifact known as the Legacy of Solomon is an unrivaled horror, a weapon built in a forgotten age that has unfortunately fallen back into the hands of mankind. It is a huge suit of exo-armor almost 13 feet tall. The most advanced and destructive weapon built during the Solomon Empire, its original name has been lost to the mists of time, its current name is reference to its origins and its role as the true legacy of a dead civilization.

Neutral Wissenschaft Leader Warrior/Mystic- Lv. 65+

At 6 | Dm 6 | Df 9 | Ar 5 | LP 35 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP ?/5

Damage Resistance: Legacy has Damage Resistance and cannot use Dodge or Counterattack Actions, except for Energy Screen.
Innate Abilities: Immunity (Poison, Blind), Open Movement.

oo - Energy Screen (Magic, Dodge)

+ 1 Defense. Limit: Once per turn.

ooo - Energy Wings (Magic, Attack)

+ 3 Attack / +3 Damage.

ooo - Unlimited (Magic, Attack)
Legacy makes an Attack against each enemy Unit within 3 inches of himself. Unlimited causes Throw.

ooo - The Voice of God (Magic,Attack)
Legacy makes two consecutive attacks against the same target.

Legacy of Solomon - Pilot

Gear: A Gear cannot have Advantage cards associated and you must select a Pilot for it. The cost of the Pilot is added to the Gear's Level. The Pilot selected for a Gear determines the number of Actions Points it will recover per Turn and may give additional abilities.

Unique Pilot: The same Pilot cannot be selected more than once in the same party, regardless of the Gear he is in.

Reist Ebersbacher - Lv. +25
Recharge: ooo
Innate Abilities: Initiative
As Pilot: Legacy obtains +1 Attack, +1 Defense, +2 Resistance and Critical Mastery.

Valeria Strauss - Lv. +10
Recharge: ooo
Innate Abilities: Advanced Deployment.
Indomitable: Legacy increases its Speed by 2 inches.

115210.name: Anima Tactics: Lorenzo
115210.description:
Lorenzo Cortes, known as VIII in the circles of Wissenschaft, is the oldest Crow in the service of the organization. Thanks to his indisputable physical power and the implants that he has received, his skills are considered the crème de la crème among his peers.

Light Wissenschaft Warrior - Lv. 50

At 4 | Dm 6 | Df 9 | Ar 1 | LP: 15 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/4

Energy Cells: At the start of the game place three "Energy" tokens on Lorenzo.

Equipment: Lorenzo may have two Advantage Cards attached to him.

Burst of Power: Before Lorenzo makes an Attack or Charge you may remove one "Energy" toke from him to give +2 Attack and make the Attack or Charge cause Throw.

oo - High Frequency (Ki, Attack)
If this Attack hits its target, the defender loses 6 LP instead of taking damage as normal. Armor value has no effect on this loss of Life Points. Effect 17.

o - Dual Buster (Ki, Charge)
Dual Buster may only be used immediately after resolving a successful Attack or Charge that causes Throw against an enemy unit. The target of the Charge must be the same Character that was thrown away. This ability allows Lorenzo to Charge even if he has already moved or Charged this turn. To use this ability, Lorenzo must remove one "Energy" token.

A part of Team Assault Group along with XII and Rayne.

115211.name: Anima Tactics: Rayne
115211.description:
Know as Number XXI in Wissenchaft hierarchy, the daughter of the
renowned Praetorian Killrayne is one of the most efficient Crows of Lucanor, thanks to the combination of her superior skills and The Process blood that runs through her veins.

Neutral Wissenschaft Warrior - Lv. 45

At 6 | Dm 2 | Df 10 | Ar 0 | LP: 12 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/4

Equipment: Rayne may have two Advantage Cards attached to her.

oo - Neokinesis (Ki, Effect)
Rayne gains Lv2 Haste. Limit: Once per game

ooo - Shadow Technique (Ki, Attack)
Rayne makes two consecutive attacks against the same target.

oooo - Unlimited Edges (Ki, Charge)

+ 5 Attack / +2 Damage.

oooo - Never Ending Illusion (Ki, Counterattack)

+ 2 Attack. If Rayne Dodges an Attack successfully, she makes four consecutive Attacks against the attacker.

A part of Team Assault Group along with XII and Lorenzo.

115213.name: greenTech
115213.description:
Winner of the YoYo Games Competition, this sixteen level game was inspired by the old computers of the day, giving you a retro action feel as you defeat global warming using your mighty hurricane.

Source: The Developer Website.

115214.name: Anima Tactics: Veronica
115214.description:
In her own words, Veronica Cortes is the best thief in Gaïa, and nothing is going to stop her to prove it to everyone. Gaining inhuman physical skill thought The Process and an incomparable six sense, her subterfuge skills are simply beyond the imagination of anyone.

Neutral Wissenschaft Prowler - Lv. 40

At 5 | Dm 2 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP: 11 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/4

Equipment: Veronica may have two Advantage Cards attached to her.

Instinct: Any enemy unit in base contact with Veronica must reveal its Advantage Cards.

oo - Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
Veronica becomes Hidden.
Upkeep: o

oo - Forgetful Kiss (Subterfuge, Attack)

+ 4 Attack / +3 Damage. This skill can only be used if Veronica is Hidden.

ooo - Deadly Dance (Subterfuge, Attack)
Veronica may make up to two attacks against the same target.

oo - Master Theft (Subterfuge, Effect)
Veronica may take one Equipment Card from any enemy unit in base contact with her. This skill allows her to surpass the number Advantage Cards she has associated with her in the beginning of the game. If she can not use the stolen card because it is limited to one Archetype or Faction, she stores it. Difficulty: 4+

o - Assignation (Subterfuge, Effect)
Veronica may give an Equipment Card she is in possession of to a friendly unit in her Control Zone. This skill can not allow a character to surpass its Advantage Card limit.

115215.name: Anima Tactics: XII
115215.description:
Little is known about XII, the reserved and solitary supervisor of the Crows of Wissenschaft. The majority of agents of the organization have never seen him, much less know him. He is a shadow that crawls in the dark, someone who appears inexplicably in different places of the world and leaves without a trace. Many say that he is no more than a ghost, a legend whose mantle is taken up by a different person over and over again.

However… he is very real.

Neutral Wissenschaft Warrior Leader - Lv. 60

At 6 | Dm 4 | Df 10 | Ar 0 | LP: 15 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/5

Innate Abilities: Initiative

Equipment: XII may have two Advantage Cards attached to him.

The Process: At the end of each Upkeep Phase, XII gains Lv1 of one of the next Status: Shield, Healing, Protection or Haste.

ooo - Veritas (Ki, Attack)

+ 5 Attack

oo - Vox Nihili (Ki, Ranged Attack)
Distance (16 inches).

o - Versus (Ki, Charge)
This ability may only be used immediately after XII hits a Character with the Vox Nihili Ranged Attack. Versus's target must be the same as Vox Nihili's target was.

o - Visio Dei (Ki, Attack)
This Attack may only be used immediately after resolving a successful Charge or Versus.

A part of Team Assault Group along with Rayne and Lorenzo.

115216.name: greenTech+
115216.description:
A commercial version of our contest winning arcade game where you must save the world from global warming using your mighty hurricane.

Source: The Developer Website.

115217.name: Table Soccer
115217.description:
Ready your table soccer team, and compete with other teams in the championship. Be prepared though; winning is not something you'll get for free. You'll have to work hard if you want to be a real champion.

Source: The Game Website.

115218.name: Anima Tactics: Wissenschaft Agent
115218.description:
Nobody knows how the enigmatic Prince Lucanor selects his agents. The motivations that bring someone like him to choose wholly disparate individuals to join their organization are also a mystery. Regardless they are all bound to Wissenschaft by ties stronger than loyalty. Some owe their lives to the Prince or have found in Wissenschaft the only place they truly feel at home. While they may not all appear to have anything in common, Wissenschaft is the focus of their lives.

Neutral Wissenschaft Prowler - Lv. 20+

At 4 | Dm 3 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP: 10 | Re 8 | Mo 8/12 | AP 2/4

Agent: Wissenschaft Agents are not unique characters and you may include 1 for every 150 Levels in an Wissenschaft Party. For example, a party of 300 levels could include up to two Wissenschaft Agents.

Innate Abilities: The Agent may have two advantage cards attached to them.

ooo - Chain of Blows (Ki, Attack)
The Agent makes two consecutive attacks against the same target

Wissenschaft Agent Skill Card

A Wissenschaft Agent can possess any combination of the following options, as long the added levels do not take their total level above 40. Any option cannot be chosen more than once.

The Agent recovers one more Action point per turn. Lv. +10
Targets get -2 Armor against the Agent's attacks (both normal and special). Lv. +5
The Agent gets the Innate Ability Ranged Attack, Distance (16 inch). Lv. +5
The Agent gets Advanced Deployment and Open Movement. Lv. +5
The Agent gets +1 Attack and +1 Defense. Lv. +5
The Agent gets +4 Life Points. Lv. +5
The Agent's Speed is increased to 12/16. Lv. +5
The Agent gets the follwing ability: Lv. +5
o - Combined Assault (Ki, Attack)
This attack may only be used immediately after resolving a successful Charge

115219.name: Dynomite
115219.description:
Clear eggs by forming groups of three or more eggs of the same color. Don't let the eggs reach the bottom of the screen!

Source: The Game Website.

115220.name: Time Mysteries: The Ancient Spectres
115220.description:
Take on Time Mysteries: The Ancient Spectres, a challenging Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game! Stop the evil witch Viviana and save Esther’s family! With her heritage on the line, it’s up to Esther to discover the history of the ancient Ambroses and explore time itself. Go on an incredible adventure and change events in the past to solve an incredible mystery in Time Mysteries: The Ancient Spectres!

Source: The Developer Website.

115221.name: Atomica
115221.description:
Move atoms to create blocks of four or more atoms of the same color in a 2x2 or larger square. The glowing atom icons indicate where the next atoms will pop up.

Source: The Game Website.

115222.name: Spielwelt (Issue 48 - Dec 1992)
rpgpublisher: Verlag für Fantasy- und Science Fiction-Spiele
115222.description: The last issue of the Spielwelt magazine. Includes the last part of the adventure "Sandobars Sechste Reise".

115223.name: Letter Detective
115223.description:
Help Dick Hollywood, the letter detective, to find the names of the people that he is missing.

Source: The Game Website.

115224.name: Dark Parables: Rise of the Snow Queen
115224.description:
Journey into the mythical Snowfall Kingdom and investigate the disappearance of children in Dark Parables: Rise of the Snow Queen! From the ashes of the snow, the legendary Snow Queen rises and terrorizes nearby villages with her supernatural powers. Rescue the missing children and stop the fabled Snow Queen before her sorrow brings upon the destruction of the world in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

Source: The Developer Website.

115225.name: Trace
115225.description:
From Introduction:

As the saying goes, there’s a thin blue line separating our civilized society from descending into chaos, and it consists of the men and women of law enforcement. Popular television dramas from as far back as Jack Webb's Dragnet in the fifties through to the groundbreaking series Hill Street Blues in the eighties, Law & Order (and its spin-offs) beginning in the nineties, and more recent dramas such as The Shield and The Wire have all sought to portray this struggle against crime and lawlessness. Similarly, shows like CSI:, Without A Trace, and Criminal Minds expand the law enforcement operation from off the street to the forensics laboratory and fields such as criminal psychology. This genre has almost limitless inspiration, from television, film, and fiction, to the newspapers that hit the newsstands every day. When the storylines cross from simple criminal investigation to the lives and loves of those who stand shoulder to shoulder against society’s miscreants, it becomes the perfect campaign setting for a modern day Cortex System game.

User note: This setting material is culled from Cortex System Role Playing Game and is freely available on the MWP website.

115226.name: Dark Parables: The Exiled Prince
videogameversion: UK Windows CD ROM Collectors Edition
115226.description:
Many centuries ago, a princess kissed a frog and transformed him into a handsome prince. Unlike the fable, they never ended happily ever after. It is rumored that the Frog Prince is still alive and now roams the deserted path in the Black Forest, capturing unsuspecting visitors. When the chancellor’s daughter goes missing, you are sent to investigate her disappearance. Journey through the deserted forest in Dark Parables: The Exiled Prince, an eerie Hidden Object Adventure game!

Source: The Developer Website.

115227.name: Bonus Content: Robin Hood
115227.description:
From Introduction:

Robin Hood. The name alone conjures images of heroic scoundrels fighting off the oppression of the rich and powerful in the eaves and shadows of the great forest of Sherwood, or atop the battlements of Nottingham castle.

There have been a thousand incarnations of the legendary outlaw and his Merry Men over the years and centuries, and we’re seemingly still not tired of the tales in the twenty-first century. Beyond a large number of books on Robin Hood, which looks at the legend in a staggering level of variety, the story is just as popular on television and on the silver screen.

And as one might expect, the oldest tales of Robin Hood are far different then the tale we know today, with such iconic characters as Friar Tuck and even Maid Marian being later additions to the myth, not to mention the whole "rob from the rich and give to the poor" shtick.

115228.name: Magic Wand
115228.description:
Educational trivia game for 5's and under.

Simple trivia questions (for us!) but challenging to a 4 year old. It works by battery. The child answer the questions on the game cards by pushing the wand into the appropriate holes. It "smiles" at the right answer, "frowns" at the wrong one.

There are 141 Questions and 16 game cards that fit over the electronics. The rules are inside the lid.

115229.name: Dark Parables: Curse of the Briar Rose
videogameversion: UK Windows CD ROM Standard Edition
115229.description:
1000 years ago, Sleeping Beauty was kissed by a prince, which removed a terrible curse from the kingdom. The rampant briars were held at bay, but the poor princess was left in her slumber. Follow a modern day detective as he travels to Edinburgh, Scotland, and attempts to end the curse once and for all in Dark Parables: Curse of Briar Rose. Dive into this eerie Hidden Object Adventure game and save Sleeping Beauty today!

Source: The Developer Website.

115230.name: WEC Le Mans
videogameversion: Amstrad CPC (The Hit Squad Re-release) Cassette edition
Commodore 64 (The Hit Squad Re-release) Cassette Edition
ZX Spectrum (The Hit Squad Re-release) Cassette Edition
115230.description:
User Summary

WEC (World Endurance Championship) Le Mans is a endurance racing game where you control your car and run on a series of tracks. The home conversions were published by Ocean on their Imagine label. The game was released on most 8-bit computers of the day. 16-bit versions for the Amiga and Atari ST were advertised, but development was cancelled in early 1989.

You must complete four laps in each track, with 3 checkpoints on each lap, so you can finish and win the race.

115231.name: A Thousand Years Under the Sun
rpg: A Thousand Years Under the Sun
115231.description:
From the website

This is a game - or a sandbox - about the rise and fall of tribes, civilizations, creatures and phenomena on the open steppes of an imaginary geography. It’s easily playable in an evening, possibly several times.

Expect play to start out slowly. The setting will grow before your eyes, under your hands. As time passes, interactions and connections tend to develop - organically, because they’re interesting.

115232.name: Road Safety Game
115232.description:
The message in this educational game is "Stay safe on the roads".

See who can be first to visit the library, school, friend's house and post office by crossing the roads safely. This will help build awareness of road safety, in particular, how and where to cross roads.

115233.description:
Roll the cubes, begin with "Far, far away...", start with the first symbol to grab your attention, and tell a story that links together all nine face-up images. There is no wrong answer, as the goal is to let the images spark your imagination.

Rory's Story Cubes: Voyages – a pocket-sized set of nine cubes depicting 54 icons to inspire epic adventure – is the second expansion set for Rory's Story Cubes, while also being a standalone item. Made to the same high quality as the original set, the cubes are inked in dark green to allow for easy sorting if you choose to use more than one set during play.

As with Rory's Story Cubes, you can play Voyages as a game for one or more players, as a party game for three or more, or as an improv game in which each player contributes part of the story, picking up where the last one left off. Win award points for speedy delivery, inventiveness, imagination, drama and humor.

Integrates with


Rory's Story Cubes
Rory's Story Cubes: Actions
boardgameversion: English edition with Dr. Toy Winner Seal
115233.name: Rory's Story Cubes: Voyages

115234.name: Cardiaxx
115234.description:
Cardiaxx is a science-fiction scrolling shooter video game for the Commodore Amiga. It was developed by Eclipse Design. Public release in 1991. The Atari ST version was never released.

The game features a spaceship as it flies through various levels of varying graphic styles. Each level has a boss at the end, and each level is separated by a sub-level of avoiding asteroids while the next level loads from the floppy disk.

Source: Wikipedia, "Cardiaxx," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115235.name: RedEye 1031
115235.description:
User Summary

You are flying along in a commercial airplane, when lightning strikes and breaks the airplane in two. Then mummies, bats and giant spiders attack. It is up to you to kill them all with an oxygen mask you grabbed and survive until the plane crashes.

115236.name: Schatzkisten stapeln
115236.description:
Objective:
gain the largest amount/value of coins stored in treasure chests
- acting by turn -
coins (gold, silver, copper) are going to be distributed randomly into treasure chests - 6 per chest
chests are going to be stapled (start position)
throw the die - now you may distribute/split rolled number on one or more chests to move with: if you succeed placing the very last moved chest on a space showing the same colour:
open the chest picking out the topmost coin
forming gaps in between chests is not allowed, they must touch at least another one;
game ends if chests are empty:
counting coins: gold 10, silver 5, copper 1 point(s)

115237.name: GURPS Low-Tech: Instant Armor
115237.description:
Publisher blurb:

The Best Defense
Every low-tech fighter (and every gamer!) knows that the secret to surviving slings and arrows -- not to mention swords, musket balls, and dragon bites -- is a good suit of armor. GURPS Low-Tech and GURPS Low-Tech Companion 2: Weapons and Warriors deliver handsomely in that department . . . but it can take a lot of number-juggling to get costs and weights for the bits you want, and some page-flipping to find the options you desire. GURPS Low-Tech: Instant Armor offers defenses against both these annoyances and battlefield dangers.

The heart of the work is a complete set of armor tables for torso, arm, leg, head, neck, hand, and foot armor; for sub-locations like the abdomen, groin, and bits of the arms and legs; and for five helmet patterns. Each table lists only the armor materials that suit the body part in question, and adjusts TL when a material is available earlier or later than usual in that role. Every piece of armor comes with DR, cost, and weight, as well as the realistic time needed to don it and a Holdout penalty that accounts for DR, flexibility, and design.

But that's not all! You also get:

•Materials and Modifications Tables. Handy summaries that let you quickly determine the options available at your TL, how they affect cost, and how they adjust the stats in the armor tables.
•Helmet Designs. Ready-to-use examples of complicated historical headgear, illustrating how the system can be used to create some classic helmets.
•Optional Rules. Answers to a variety of questions, from "How much does it cost to armor only my vitals?" to "Can I sleep in armor?"
If you've ever been frustrated trying to armor your TL0-4 warriors, then Low-Tech: Instant Armor is for you!

Low-Tech: Instant Armor is a supplement to GURPS Low-Tech, but the armor stats within would be useful in any TL0-4 GURPS campaign.

115238.name: Rebelstar Raiders
115238.description:
User Summary

Rebelstar Raiders is a tactical combat game developed by Julian Gallop. It is one of the 3 Rebelstar games that would eventually lead to the development of games like Laser Squad and X-Com.

The game has 3 scenarios in which you will lead your squad against the enemy forces.

115239.name: RIFT (2009)
115239.description:
User Summary

You are RIFT (Robotic somewhat Intelligent Food Transporter). Your goal is to fetch cake for your master. Pick up blocks, jump to higher platforms, travel through transporters all to feed cake to your pink master. You slow down when carrying items, and jump with less vigor.

115240.name: Rebelstar
115240.description:
User Summary

Rebelstar was the second game of the Rebelstar series by Julian Gallop.

This is a tactical combat game where you control your squad against the enemy forces.
There is only one scenario with different levels of difficulty.

115241.name: Road of the Dead
115241.description:
User Summary

A survival horror driving game set in the zombie apocalypse. Working on your car one day, you here the Emergency Broadcast System alert on your radio informing you to stay indoors. At the same time you hear the crash of glass, moaning and screams. You flick through the radio and decide your best bet is to make a dash for it. Drive through the city, plot out your course, avoid obstacles, and most of all, make it out alive.

115242.description: The Natural Disaster Cards are a set of promotional cards for the Rolling Freight game. Natural Disasters are shuffled into the contract deck during setup - one into the ‘B’ phase and two into the ‘C’ deck. During the game, when a natural disaster card is drawn from the contract deck, draw a completed contract card at random and remove that link from the game board, along with all saturation markers at both ends of the link. Finish filling the contract track. Finally, place the destroyed contract face-down on top of.its deck. If multiple disasters are drawn while filling the track, destroy additional completed contracts and place them face down on top of the deck, in the order they were drawn.
115242.name: Rolling Freight: Natural Disaster Cards

115243.description: The Texas Map for the Rolling Freight game was made available as an exclusive item to people that pledged to support the Rolling Freight project on Kickstarter. This map was designed to be an apegames.com download, but was instead printed copies for each copy of the game that we ship for Kickstarter backers. It was printed on thick paper and quarter-fold it so that it fits nicely into the Rolling Freight box. This map is designed as a quick 2-3 player map which can be played in about an hour.
115243.name: Rolling Freight: Texas Map

115244.name: Robo Slug
115244.description:
User Summary

Someone has hacked into the military robots and they have gone haywire. It is up to you, Robo Slug to stop them. Jump run and shoot your way to victory. Use your limited supply of grenades carefully. This is a fast paced game, and you will need to grab the ever shifting power-ups quickly.

115245.name: Scranton-opoly
115245.description:
"It's all fun and games until someone lands in the slammer!"

Another monopoly clone but this time for the Scranton, PA area. The board features notable business such as the Radisson Lackawanna Station Hotel, The University of Scranton and Savvi Formalwear by Sarno & Son.

115246.name: Robo Slug 2
115246.description:
User Summary

Robots are once again on the attack. Control Robo Slug to destroy them. This game features an improved jumping mechanism, a less harried pace, limited ammunition, the ability to toggle through weapons, and the gun is controlled with the mouse.

115247.name: Rebelstar 2
115247.description:
User Summary

Rebelstar 2 is another game, in a series of 3, by Julian Gallop.

Like the previous games its a tactical turn based game, where you take charge of your squad to fight against the enemy forces.

115248.name: Grunt: The Modern Death-dealing Card Game
115248.description:
Grunt is a warfare card game using a board to depict 6 combat areas where Grunts(infantry) engage in combat.

The 6 combat areas depicted on the board (Town, Woods, Ruins, Hills, Swamp, and Fields) affect combat potential dependng on equipment and attack types used. Players take turn drawing and playing cards. Types of cards are: Black (Action) cards, Red (Explosives) cards, Green (Strike) cards, Orange (Equipment) cards and Blue (Special Defense) cards.

Black Action or Green Strike cards are played hidden and take effect only on the next turn. This is done to simulate the time it takes to perform combat maneuvres. Orange Equipment and Red Explosives cards must be played immediately when drawn. Blue Special Defense cards can be played at any time.
